tgt_text: ukubuyela emsebenzini emva kokululama kwicovid19 allison cooper ungabuyela nini emsebenzini uma ngabe uke watholakala ukuthi wesuleleke ngegciwane lecorona (icovid19)?

src_text: masigcinane sikhuselekile vukuzenzele unnamed ilizwe lethu lehlele kwinqanaba lokulu mka lesi2 kwimpe ndulo yethu kubhu bhane wentsholongwa ne icorona .
tgt_text: masigcinane siphephile vukuzenzele unnamed izwe lethu lehlele esigabeni sesi2 sokuqapha ekulweni kwethu nobhubhane lwegciwane lecorona .

src_text: oku kuni ke uninzi lwabantu basemzantsi afrika abe behlala phantsi kwemi qathango engqongqo kwezi nyanga zintlanu zidlulileyo isiqabu.
tgt_text: lokhu kube njengokukhu luleka kubobonke abantu baseningizimu afrika abesebephila ngaphansi kwemikhawulo enzima izi nyanga eziyisihlanu eze dlule.

src_text: olu luphawu lwenkqubela esiyenzayo ekunciphiseni usuleleko olutsha nomthwa lo kumaziko wenkathalelo yezonyango wethu.
tgt_text: kuluphawu lwenqubeke laphambili esiyenzayo uku nciphisa ukusuleleka okusha kanye nomthamo ezikhu ngweni zethu zezempilo.

src_text: ikwayi nkqubela phambili ebalu leke kakhulu njengokuba sizamela ukuqalisa ngoqo qosho lwethu.
tgt_text: futhi kungukuthuthuka okubalulekile kakhulu njengoba siphokophelele ekuqaleni umnotho wethu kabusha.

src_text: kodwa kusekutsha kakhu lu ukuba singakubhiyozela oku.
tgt_text: kodwake kusesekuseni kakhulu ukuthi singajabula.

src_text: sisesembindini wobhubha ne obulalayo osele uthathe imiphefumlo engaphezulu kwe11 000 kumzantsi afri ka nje wodwa.
tgt_text: sisaphila phakathi kwalo mashayabhuqe wobhubhane osuthathe izimpilo zabantu abayizi11 000 eningizimu afrika kuphela nje.

src_text: kwizehlo zosuleleko ezingaphezulu kwesiqingatha sesigidi ezi ngqiniweyo, sisekwindawo yesihlanu ubuninzi bosule leko ehlabathini.
tgt_text: ezi gamekweni eziqinisekisiwe ezingaphezu kwesigamu sesigidi, sisahleli esibalweni sesihlanu samanani aphe zulu kakhulu okwesuleleka emhlabeni.

src_text: kwaye akusoloko ekhona wona amathuba wokuba esi sifo singaphinda sivuke kwa khona.
tgt_text: futhi kuhlale kunethuba lokuphinde si bheduke isifo.

src_text: ukuba ngokuyinene sidi nga ukuzikhumbuza nge mfuno yokuba sihlale sipha phile, kufanele sikhangele kwizehlo zakutsha nje ku mgama ongamawaka nga mawaka weekilomitha kude le enew zealand.
tgt_text: uma kwenzeka sidinga into ezosikhumbuza isidingo sokuthi siqaphelisise, kumele sibheke izigameko zaka muva ezenzeke endaweni engamakhilomitha ayizinku lungwane enew zealand.

src_text: kwisithu ba nje seenyanga ezintathu emva kokuba ela lizwe libhe ngezwe njengelingenayo intsholongwane icorona , inew zealand kwakhona ikwisimo sokuvaleleka phantsi kwemiqathango ethile.
tgt_text: ezinyangeni ezintathu emva kokumemezela izwe njenge lingasenalo igciwane lecorona, inew zealand isiphinde yaba ngaphansi kokuvalwa kwezwe.

src_text: nangona okwakutsha nje ukuqhambuka kwakho na kwale ntsholongwane kube zizehlo nje ezimbalwa, urhulumente ukhawulezise wamisela kwakhona imi qathango yokuvaleleka pha ntsi kwemiqathango ethile.
tgt_text: yize ukuqubuka kwegciwane kwakamuva kwaba nezigameko ezimba lwa, uhulumeni waphinde wabeka imikhawulo yoku valwa kwezwe ngokupha zima kweso.

src_text: imiqathango efanayo kuye kwanyanzeleka imiselwe kwakhona kwimimandla eliqela yaseyurobhu nje ngokuba baye beva ‘umsi nga wesibini’ wosuleleko.
tgt_text: imikhawulo efanayo kumele ukuthi iphinde ibekwe ezingxenyeni ezini ngi zaseyurophu njengo ba bebhekane ‘nehlandla lesibili’ lokusuleleka.

src_text: la mava abonakalisa nje ukuba izinto zitshintsha msinya kangakanani na ngoku bhekisele kwicovid19 .
tgt_text: lezi zigameko zibonisa ukuthi izinto zingaguquka kanjani ngokuphazima nje kweso ngenxa yecovid19 .

src_text: sisilumkiso eso kuye naba ni na onemibono yokubona into engekhoyo yokuba sesisondele esiphelweni sokuba kwimo enzima kaxa keka kumaziko wezempilo kawonkewonke.
tgt_text: kuyisixwayiso kunoma ngubani phakathi kwethu ongaphupha emini ukuthi selidumela emansumpeni ekuboneni isiphetho saloku kufa kwempilo yomphakathi ephuthumayo.

src_text: ngokuqinisekileyo, zikho na iimpawu zethemba zona.
tgt_text: nomakanjani, ikhona inhla nsi yethemba elokozayo.

src_text: inani lezehlo ezitsha zosule leko ezingqiniweyo emza ntsi afrika ziyaqhubeka ukwehla.
tgt_text: inani lezigameko ezintsha eziqinisekisiwe eningizimu afrika liyaqhubeka nokwe hla.

src_text: ngexesha sisenco tsheni yovuthondaba lwesi sifo kwinyanga nje enye edlu lileyo, besibhalisa malunga ne12 000 lezehlo ezitsha zo suleleko ngosuku.
tgt_text: esicongweni sesifo enya ngeni eyodwa eyedlule, inani lezigameko eziqinise kisiwe ezintsha beliyizi12 000 ngosuku.

src_text: oku kuye kwehla kwafika kumyinge omalunga nama5 000 ngo suku kule veki idlulileyo.
tgt_text: lokhu sekwe hle kwaya esilinganisweni esiphakathi esiyizi5 000 ngosuku evikini eledlule.

src_text: izinga lethu lokuphucuka lumi kuma80 eepesenti.
tgt_text: izinga lethu lokululama lime kumaphesenti angama80.

src_text: njengokuba ilizwe lehlele kwinqanaba lokulumka lesi2, imiqathango emi ninzi kwiintshukumo ze zolonwabo nezoqoqosho isusiwe.
tgt_text: njengoba izwe lehlela esigabeni sesi2 sokuqapha, imikhawulo eminingi kwe zenhlalo nakwezomnotho isi susiwe.

src_text: oku kuhambelana nokwanda komngcipheko wokusasazeka.
tgt_text: lokhu kuza nobungo zi obukhulu bokusuleleka.

src_text: ngoku kufanele siwu lawule umngcipheko size siqinisekise ukuba iinzuzo esele sizizuzile ukuza ku tsho ngoku ekulawuleni ukunwena kwalo bhubhane asizibuyiseli mva.
tgt_text: manje sekumele silawule ubungozi futhi siqinisekise ukuthi esesikuzuzile kuze kube manje ekubambeze leni ukubhebhetheka kobhu bhane akubuyeli emuva.

src_text: esona soyikiso sikhulu kwimpilo yelungelo lesizwe ngoku kukwaneliseka.
tgt_text: ubungozi obulengele impilo yesizwe njengamanje ukwe qiwa injabulo bese sikhohlwa ubungozi.

src_text: kuseno kuba sivumelekile ngoku ukuba sidibane nabahlobo neentsapho, siye kwiindawo zokuzonwabisa, sihambele ulonwabo nokusela utywala kwiindawo zokutyela, iibha ri neethaveni.
tgt_text: kungenzeka ukuthi manje sesivumelekile ukuhlangana nabangani nomndeni, ukuvakashela izindawo zokuzijabulisa, ukuthatha uhambo kuyonce belekwa nokuphuza utshwa la ezindaweni zokudlela, ezindaweni zokuphuzela utshwala nasemathaveni.

src_text: kodwa ke njengoko lisi tsho iqhalo lakudala, into yokuba uyakwazi, ayithethi ukuba kufanele wenze.
tgt_text: kodwa njengesisho saku dala esithi, ukuthi unga kwazi ukwenza into, lokho akusho ukuthi kumele uye nze.

src_text: uninzi lwabantu aba nentsholongwane icorona ababinazo iimpawu kwaye basenokungayazi nokuba bosulelekile.
tgt_text: abantu abaningi abahaqwe igciwane lecorona abanazo izimpawu futhi kungenzeka bangazi nakwazi ukuthi ba sulelekile.

src_text: le yinyaniso ezolisayo kuba oku kuthetha ukuba nabani na apha kuthi usenokuba wosulelekile ngoku sithethayo kwaye usenokuba wosulela abanye engaqondanga.
tgt_text: leli iqiniso eli hlasimulisa umzimba ngoba lokhu kusho ukuthi noma ngubani kithina kungenzeka usulelekile njengamanje futhi kungenzeka usulele abanye ngokungenhloso.

src_text: oku kungenzeka ngoku kodwa xa ehambele izihlobo, ingakumbi abantu abadala kunye nabo banezigulo abaphila nazo ezibenza babe sesichengeni sokosuleleka lula.
tgt_text: kuzoba njalo uma ku vakashelwa izihlobo, ikakhu lukazi abantu asebekhulile kanye nalabo abanezifo ezi ngamahlalakhona ezibenza babe buthakathaka ekwe sulelekeni.

src_text: kukwayinyaniso uku ba naxa beye kwimisebenzi yezenkolo okanye yezenkcu beko.
tgt_text: futhi kuliqiniso uma kuthanyelwa izinkonzo noma imicimbi yamasiko.

src_text: ‘umsinga wesibini’ wo suleleko athe amazwe ama ninzi awuva yinto eyaku hlala inokwenzeka nakuthi.
tgt_text: ‘ihlandla lesibili’ lokwe suleleka amanye amazwe amaningi abhekene nalo into ehlezi ingenzeka na kuthina.

src_text: nangona imiqathango emininzi irhoxisiwe, oko akuthethi ukuba ayinoku phinda ibuye xa sinoku phinda sehlelwe kukunyuka okukhulu kosuleleko.
tgt_text: yize imikhawulo eminingi seyisusiwe, lokhu akusho ukuthi ngeke iphinde ibuyiswe uma kungenzeka sibhekane nokukhuphuka kokusuleleka.

src_text: lo bhubhane yinto yokuphila nokufa.
tgt_text: lolu bhu bhane luyisimo sokufa noku phila.

src_text: sidinga ukuziqhela nisa kwaye sidinga ukuba sihlale siphaphile.
tgt_text: kumele sivumelane nesimo futhi sidinga ukuthi siqaphelisise.

src_text: kwezi ntsuku, iiveki nee nyanga ezizayo, kufuneka sigxile ngokungxamiseki leyo kumalinge wethu oku phila.
tgt_text: ezinsukwini, emavikini nasezinyangeni ezizayo, kumele ngokuphuthumayo sibhekane nemizamo yethu yokululama.

src_text: uqoqosho noluntu lwethu luchaneke kakhulu.
tgt_text: umnotho wethu nomphakathi wethu bakhahlamezeke kakhulu.

src_text: njengokuba sibuyela kwii ntshukumo zezoqoqosho phantse kuwo onke ama shishini – nokusebenzela ukulungisa umonakalo owenzekileyo – sinoxanduva lokuba singayekeleli umxa katho umntu ngamnye, abaqeshi, uluntu, iintsapho, amagcisa ezemisebenzi, abasebenzi nabemi.
tgt_text: njengoba sesibuyela emse benzini cishe kuzozonke izimboni – futhi sisebenza ukulungisa umonakalo owenzekile – sinesibophe zelo sokungayekeli uku hlale siqaphile njengomunye nomunye, njengabaqashi, njengomphakathi, njenge mindeni, njengochwephe she, njengabasebenzi kanye nezakhamuzi.

src_text: akukho namnye kuthi ofu na ukubuyela kweza ntsuku zokuqala zemiqathango engqongqo yokuvaleleka phantsi kwemiqathango ethile.
tgt_text: akekho kuthina ofuna ukubuyela ezinsukwini ezi dlule zemikhawulo eqinile yokuvalwa kwezwe.

src_text: sifuna ukuqhu bela phambili nobomi bethu.
tgt_text: sifuna ukuqhubeka nezimpilo zethu.

src_text: sifuna abahlobo bethu nabo sibathandayo bahlale bese mpilweni kwaye bekhuse lekile.
tgt_text: sifuna abangani bethu nabathandiweyo bethu bahlale benempilo futhi be phephile.

src_text: njengesizwe, masiqhubeke ukusebenza sonke uku qinisekisa ukuba siqhubela phambili.
tgt_text: njengesizwe, asiqhubeke sisebenze ngokubambisana ukuqinisekisa ukuthi siqhubekela phambili.

src_text: ukwehlela kwi nqanaba lokulumka lesi2 asinguye ‘uvula zibhuqe’.
tgt_text: ukwehlela esigabeni sesi2 sokuvalwa kwezwe akuyona nje ‘inkululeko kawonkewonke.’ imithetho yokuqhelelana, ukugqokwa kwezifonyo, imibuthano yomphakathi kanye noku vakashela amanye amazwe isamile.

src_text: umthetho wokugcina umgama wokuqelelana, ukunxitywa kwesigqubu thelo sobuso, iindibano zolonwabo nohambo phakathi kwezizwengezi zwe usemile.
tgt_text: impumelelo yethu ilele ekuthobeleni kwethu le mithethonqubo futhi noku qinisekisa ukuthi omunye nomunye uziphatha ngoku zinakekela nangokuzibo phezela.

src_text: impumelelo yethu ixho mekeke kumandla oku kwazi ukuyithobela le mi miselo nokuqinisekisa ukuba siziphatha ngoku lumkileyo nangenkathalo umntu ngamnye kuthi.
tgt_text: ngaso sonke isikhathi uma sicabanga nanoma isiphi isenzo esingabalulekile, kumele sibuze ukuthi: ibu phi ubungozi bokusuleleka kuthina nakwabanye?

src_text: ngalo lonke ixesha sicinga ngokwenza imisebenzi enge nguwo undoqo, kufanele sizibuze ukuba: ungakanani umngcipheko wokosule leka kwethu nabanye?
tgt_text: lapho kukhona khona ubungozi, noma ngabe buncane kanga kanani, kungcono ninga kwenzi.

src_text: apho kukho khona umngcipheko, nokuba umncinci kangaka nani na, kungcono ungabi sakwenza oko ubukucinga.
tgt_text: asiphokophele phambili, njengakuqala, ngokuqa phela.

src_text: masiqhubeni, ngobu lumko, obungaphezulu kunangaphambili.
tgt_text: masigcinane siphephile vukuzenzele unnamed izwe lethu lehlele esigabeni sesi2 sokuqapha ekulweni kwethu nobhubhane lwegciwane lecorona .

src_text: khusela amanina nabantwana vukuzenzele unnamed kunyaka ophelileyo, phantse ngolu suku, amawaka amanina, amadoda nabantwana benza umngcelele oya epalamente bekhalazela iziganeko zokudlwengulwa nokubulawa kwamanina namantombazana.
tgt_text: masivikele abesifazane nabantwana bethu vukuzenzele unnamed onyakeni owedlule, osukwini oluseduze nje, izinku lungwane zabesifazane, amadoda kanye nabantwana bamashela ephalamende ukuyobhikishela ukulwisana nesihlava sokudlwengulwa kanye nokubulawa kwabesifazane namantombazane.

src_text: ngelo xesha, isizwe sasixhelekile kukubulawa kukauyinene mrwetyana, uleighandre jegels, ujesse hess kunye namanye amanina aphulukana nobomi bawo ebulawa ngamadoda anobundlobongela.
tgt_text: ngaleso sikhathi, isizwe sasi sakhungathwe ukubulawa kukauyinene mrwetyana, uleighandre jegels, ujesse hess kanye nabanye abesifazane abaningi abalahlekelwa izimpilo zabo ngezandla zamadoda anesihluku.

src_text: abaqhankqalazi ababenoxolo, bephuma kwiindawo ngeendawo, bequka abancinci nabadala, abafundi kunye namanina asebenzayo, babephethe amaxwebhu amakhulu bewaphakamisele phezulu kwaye ayefundeka ngolu hlobo 'enough is enough' amanye ebhalwe ' am i next?'.
tgt_text: kusuka kuyoyonke indawo, omnca ne nomdala, abafundi nabesifazane abasebenzayo, ababhikishi ababebhikisha ngokuthula babephakamise izingqwembe ezazibhalwe ukuthi 'enough is enough ' nokuthi ' am i next?'.

src_text: intlungu nomsindo zazibhalwe ebusweni babantu ngaloo mini.
tgt_text: usizi nentukuthelo kwakubhalwe emehlweni ngalolo suku.

src_text: njengokuba ndandifumana izikhalazo zabo ezicaciswe gca, kwakucacile kum ukuba kufuneka sithathe amanyathelo ngokungxamisekileyo nangokuzimisela.
tgt_text: ngesikhathi ngamukela izimfuno zabo ezazibekwe zacaca bha, kwacaca kumina ukuthi kudingeka sisukume ngokushesha futhi nangokuzimisela.

src_text: kwakubalulekile kum ukuba ndingaphenduli nje ndingadlulisi usana kunina xa ndibaphendula futhi ndenze nezithembiso endingazi kuzizalisekisa.
tgt_text: kwakubalulekile kumina ukuthi ngingaphenduli ngamagama ayize leze futhi nangezithembiso zamanga.

src_text: emva kwentsuku ezimbalwa, ndabiza indibano yezindlu zombini zepalamente, apho ndazisa isicwangciso sokusebenza esingxamisekileyo esasiza kutyabula isigidigidi seerandi esiyi1.6 sokulwa ubundlobongela obubhekiselele kwisini kunye nokubulawa kwamanina (igbvf).
tgt_text: ezinsukwini ezimbalwa ezalandela, ngabiza umhlangano wokuhlala ngokuhlanganyela kwezindlu zombili zephalamende, lapho samemezela isamba esingur1.6 wesigidigidi sohlelo lwezinyathelo eziphuthumayo zokulwisananodlame olubhekiswe kubulili obuthile nokubulawa kwabesifazane (igbvf).

src_text: kwezi nyanga zintandathu zokuqhuba kwesi sicwangciso, urhulumente woxule imali kumasebe ahlukeneyo ache; wayithumela kumaphulo okuncedisa kunakekelo nenkxaso yabo basinde kwintlungu yegbvf , kumaphulo okufundisa nokuthintela igbvf , okuphucu la imithetho nemigaqonkqubo, okukhuthaza ukuxhotyiswa kwamanina ngokwezoqoqosho nokwenza ngqingqwa nangcono icandelo lezolwaphulomthetho nobulungisa.
tgt_text: ezinyangeni eziyisithupha selokhu sethulwa, ukusetshenziswa kwemali eminyangweni ehlukene kahulumeni kwabuye kwahlelwa kwabusha ngokubeka phambili ukunakekelwa nokwesekwa kwabasindile, ukuqwashisa kanye nemikhankaso yoku vikela, ukwenza ngcono imithetho nezinqubomigomo, ukuthuthukisa ukwesekwa kwabesifazane kwezomnotho, kanye nokuqinisa uhlelo lobulungiswa kwezobugebengu.

src_text: kwaye ngoku sekumbovu ukuba senze utshintsho olumandla kwimithetho yokulwa negbvf .
tgt_text: futhi njengamanje sisesikhathini lapho ingalo ende yomthetho isiguqulwe kabusha ukuze kuliwe negbvf .

src_text: imithetho eyilwayo engundoqo emithathu enxulumene nobundlobongela obusekelwe kwisini isanda kungeniswa epalamente.
tgt_text: imithethosivivinywa emithathu ebalulekile ehlobene negbvf yethulwe ephalamende muva nje.

src_text: ngokungenisa le mithetho iyilwayo, sizalisekisa isithembiso esasenza kubaqhankqalazi kunyaka ophelileyo nakuwo onke amanina eli.
tgt_text: ngokwethulwa kwale mithethosivivinywa, sigcina isethembiso esasenza kubabhikishi ngonyaka odlule nakubobonke abesifazane bakuleli lizwe.

src_text: le mithetho iyilwayo mithathu yenziwe izilungiso ilungiselelwe kanye ukuvala izikhewu ezivumela abanye baba bophulimthetho ukuba bakwazi ukungaziva izithonga zomthetho futhi ifezekisa namalungelo amanina nabantwana belizwe lethu.
tgt_text: imithethosivivinywa echitshiyelwe emithathu yenzelwe ukuvala igebe elivumela izaphulamthetho ukubalekela ubulungiswa futhi inika ngokugcwele abesifazane nabantwana bezwe lethu amalungelo.

src_text: le mithetho iyilwayo, nje yakuba igqitywe, iya kunceda ukubuyisela ukuzithemba kwamanina elizwe lethu ukuba umthetho ukhona ngokwenene ukubakhusela.
tgt_text: le mithethosivivinywa, uma isiphasisiwe yaba imithetho, izosiza ukubuyisa ukuzethemba kwabesifazane bezwe lethu njengoba umthetho ukhona ukuze ubavikele.

src_text: owokuqala ngumthetho oyilwayo owenza izilungiso kumthethosihlomelo womthetho wolwaphu lomthetho (amatyala esondo kunye nemicimbi enxulumene noko).
tgt_text: owokuqala umthethosivivinywa ochibiyela umthetho wokuchibiyela wamacala ezobugebengu (amacala ezocansi nahambisana nawo).

src_text: oku kudala ityala elitsha lokugrogrisa ngokwesondo, kwandise izinto ezinokuqukwa kwityala lombulo, futhi kwandise nomsebenzi wokunika ingxelo wabantu abakrokrela ukuba ulwaphulomthetho ngokwesondo lwenziwe emntwaneni.
tgt_text: lokhu kwethula amacala amasha okusatshiswa ngokocansi, amacala okulalana kwezihlobo, kanye nomsebenzi wabantu wokubika uma besola ukuthi kukhona ukuhlukunyezwa ngokocansi okwenzekile emntwaneni.

src_text: yandisa iinkcukacha ezifakwa kwirejista kazwelonke yabaphulimthetho ngokwesondo (inrso) zitsho ziquke iinkcukacha zabo bonke abaphulimthetho ngokwesondo.
tgt_text: iphinde yelula ukuthi irejista kazwelonke yamacala ezocansi (inrso) ifake lonke uhla lwabaphulimthetho kwezocansi.

src_text: kude kube ngoku, ibikade iquka kuphela abaphulimthetho abadlwengule abantwana okanye abantu abakhubazeke ngokwengqondo.
tgt_text: kuze kube manje, isafake kuphela abaphulimthetho kwezocansi abalahlwe ngamacala ezocansi kubantwana noma kubantu abaphila nokukhubazeka ngokwengqondo.

src_text: ixesha apho iinkcukacha zomaphulimthetho ekufuneka zihlale kwirejista landisiwe, futhi abo bakule rejista kuya kufuneka bakuxele oku xa bethumela izicelo zokusebenza nabantu abasesichengeni.
tgt_text: isikhathi sokugcinwa kohla lwesaphulimthetho sikhushuliwe, futhi labo abafakwe kurejista kuzomele bakudalule lokho uma befaka izicelo zokusebenza nabantu ababuthakathaka.

src_text: lo mthetho oyilwayo ukwavumela nokuba amagama abantu abakwinrsoapapashwe esidlangalaleni.
tgt_text: umthethosivivinywauphinde uhlinzekele ukuthi amagama abantu akunrso umphakathi uyakwazi ukuwathola.

src_text: umthethosihlomelo oyilwayo wezolwaphulomthetho kunye nemicimbi enxulumene nawo uyaqiniswa, phakathi kwezinyeizinto, ukunikwa ibheyile kwabo benzi begbvf , kwaye uyawandisaamatyala apho ezona zigwebo ziphantsi kufuneka zenziwe.
tgt_text: isichibiyelo somthethosivivinywa wamacala obugebengu kanye nahambisana nawo sizoqinisa, phakathi kokunye, ukunikezwa kwebheyili kwezaphulamthetho zegbvf , futhi sichaze kabanzi ngamacala azothola izigwebo ezincane.

src_text: ezi zilungiso zibeka uxanduva olutsha kumagosa ogcinomthetho kunye nakwiinkundla zethu.
tgt_text: izichibiyelo zibeka izibopho ezintsha phezu kwezikhulu zomthetho kanye nezinkantolo zethu.

src_text: xa umtshutshisi engayiphikisi ibheyile kumatyala egbv , kufune ka izizathu zabo zibhalwe phantsi.
tgt_text: uma umshushisi engasiphikisi isicelo sebheyili emacaleni egbv , kumele abhale izizathu zakhe phansi.

src_text: ngaphandle kokuba umntu otyholwa ngegbv unika izizathu ezi vakalayo zokuba kutheni kufuneka akhululwe ngebheyile, inkundla kufuneka iyalele ukuba bavalelwe lide ityala lixoxwe ligqitywe.
tgt_text: ngaphandle uma umsolwa wecala legbv angabeka izimo ezinqala ukuthi kungani kumele akhululwe ngebheyili, inkantolo kumele inqume ukuthi bavalelwe kuze kuphele ukuthethwa kwecala.

src_text: ukufikelela kwisigqibo malunga nesicelo sebheyile, iinkundla ziyanyanzeliswa ukuba zithathele ingqalelo izinto ezininzi.
tgt_text: ekuthatheni isinqumo esicelweni sebheyili, izinkantolo ziphoqelekile ukucabangisisa ngezinto eziningi.

src_text: ziquka iingxelo zaphambi kokumanyelwa kwetyala ngokunqwenela ukukhululwa komtyholwa ngebheyile, izoyikiso zobundlobongela ezenziwe kulowo ulixhoba, kunye nembono yexhoba malunga nokhuseleko lwakhe.
tgt_text: okubandakanya imibiko yaphambi kokuthethwa kwecala, ukwesatshiswa okunodlame kosindile, kanye nombono wosindile mayelana nokuphepha kwakhe.

src_text: xa kufikelelwa kwingqa wule, ummangali okanye isizalwane sexhoba elingasekhoyo kufuneka sikwazi ukwenza uluvo kwibhodi yengqawule.
tgt_text: mayelana noshwele, ummangali noma isihlobo sesisulu esashona kumele bakwazi ukuyozimela kwibhodi likashwele.

src_text: ngenxa yamanqanaba aphezulu ngokugqithisileyo obundlobongela obuphakathi kwabantu abazizinqandamathe kwilizwe lethu, siwenze ngqingqwa umthetho wobundlobongela basekhaya.
tgt_text: ngokubuka amazinga angamukeleki neze odlame kubalingani abasebudlelwaneni ezweni lethu, sesiqinise ukuhlinzekwa komthetho wodlame lwasekhaya.

src_text: ubundlobongela basekhaya ngoku buchaphazela nabo sele bevumelene ngokutshatana, bathandanayo, batshate ngokwesintu, kunye nabakrokrelwa ukuba bayathandana, babelana ngesondo, bayazana nokuba obo budlelwane bunexesha elingakanani na.
tgt_text: udlame lwasekhaya manje seluchazwa ukuze luvikele labo abathembisene umshado, abajolayo, ubudlelwano bamasiko, abathandanayo, ubudlelwano bocansi osebuqhubeke noma isikhathi esingakanani.

src_text: lo mthetho oyilwayo kwakhona ukwandisa inkcazo ‘yobundlobongela basekhaya’ ukuba buquke ukukhuselwa kwabantu abadala ekuxhatshazweni ngamalungu osapho.
tgt_text: umthethosivivinywauphinde welule ukuchazwa'kodlame lwasekhaya' ukuze ufake ukuvikelwa kwabantu abadala ekuhlukunyezweni ngamalungu omndeni.

src_text: abamangali kufuneka bakwazi ukufaka isicelo sokhuseleko kwiintanethi.
tgt_text: abamangali bazokwazi ukufaka izicelo zomyalo wokuvikelwa ngeinthanethi.

src_text: ukuthintela imeko apho abenzi bobubi benokuzifihla izinto ababezenze ngaphambili, kuza kubakho uluhlu olunabo bonke abantu ababekhe bakhutshelwa umyalelo wokukhuselwa yinkundla.
tgt_text: ukugwema isimo lapho izaphulamthetho zingafihla imilando yodlame lwasekhaya, kuzosungulwa inqolobane yemiyalo yokuvikelwa.

src_text: ezi zilungiso zicetywayo zikwanyanzela isebe lezophuhliso loluntu, elezemfundo esisiseko, elezemfundo ephakamileyo kunye nelezempilo ukuba anikezele ngeenkonzo ezithile kumaxhoba apho zifuneka khona aze awathumele kwindawo yokuhlala nonyango.
tgt_text: izichibiyelo ezethuliwe ziphinde ziphoqe iminyango yokuthuthukiswa komphakathi, owemfundo eyisisekelo, owemfundo ephakeme kanye nowezempilo ukuthi ihlinzeke ngezinsiza ezithile kwabasindile uma kudingeka nokubathumela ukuze bathole ukukhosela nokunakekelwa kokwelashwa.

src_text: zimbalwa ngoku iimeko aphoumtshutshisi anokwala ukutshutshisa xa amatyala enziwe phantsi komthetho ohlaziyiweyo okanye ukurhoxiswa kwezityholo ezibandakanywa ukwenzakaliswa komzimba okanye apho kusetyenziswe isixhobo ukugrogrisa ummangali.
tgt_text: izimo lapho umshushisi anganqaba ukushushisa uma amacala enziwe ngaphansi komthetho ochitshiyelwe noma ukusula icala uma kufaka phakathi ukulimala noma lapho kukhona isikhali esasetshenziswa ukusabisa ummangali.

src_text: esona silungiso sicetywayo sigqibeleleyo salo mthetho, kukuba ukuba umntu unolwazi, inkolelo efanelekileyo okanye urhano lokuba isenzo sobundlobongela basekhaya senziwe emntwaneni, umntu okhubazekileyo okanye umntu omdala futhi othe wasilela ukusixela kunontlalontle, okanye kwipolisa banokuhlawuliswa kwaye bade bavalelwe entolongweni.
tgt_text: uma mhlawumbe ukuchitshiyelwa okuqinile okwethuliwe komthetho, uma umuntu othile enolwazi,ekholelwa noma enezinsolo zokuthi isenzo sodlame lwasekhaya lwenzekile emntwaneni, kumuntu ophila nokukhubazeka noma kumuntu omdala futhi ahluleke ukubika kusonhlalakahle noma ephoyiseni angahlawuliswa noma aboshwe.

src_text: ngokunjalo, ukusilela kwelungu lesaps ukwenza umsebenzi walo ngokwalo mthetho kuya kuthathwa njengokuziphatha gwenxa futhi kufuneka kunikwe ingxelo kwicandelo loonobhala boluntu lenkonzo yamapolisa.
tgt_text: ngokufanayo, ukuhluleka kwelungu lesaps ukulandela isibopho ngaphansi komthetho kuzothathwa njengokuphula umthetho futhi kumele libikwe kumabhalane wophiko lwamaphoyisa.

src_text: umthetho ungowona mkhuseli uqinisekileyo woluntu lonke, kodwa ingakumbi abona basesichengeni.
tgt_text: umthetho ungumvikeli wokuqala womphakathi, kodwa ikakhulukazi labo ababuthakathaka.

src_text: xa usetyenziswe ngenkuthalo nangobulungisa, sesona siqinisekiso somthetho sinamandla.
tgt_text: uma senza ngokukhuthala nangokulunga, lokho ikona okuqinisekisa amandla obulungiswa.

src_text: amanina asemzantsi afrika anele ngamanyathelo alibetha ngoyaba futhi engathethi nto ngelinye lawona malungelo asisiseko ukuhlala ngokukhululekileyo kuloyiko.
tgt_text: abesifazane baseningizimu afrika sebekhathele izinyathelo ezingayi ndawo ezingaxazululi ngisho nelu ngelo elibaluleke kakhulu kunawo wonke ukuphila ngokukhululeka ngaphandle kokwesaba.

src_text: lo rhulumente kunye namaqabane akhe baza kwenza okuhle kumanina asemzantsi afrika.
tgt_text: lo hulumeni nabambisene nabo bazobenzela kahle abesifazane baseningizimu afrika.

src_text: asisoze sibaphoxe.
tgt_text: masivikele abesifazane nabantwana bethu vukuzenzele unnamed onyakeni owedlule, osukwini oluseduze nje, izinku lungwane zabesifazane, amadoda kanye nabantwana bamashela ephalamende ukuyobhikishela ukulwisana nesihlava sokudlwengulwa kanye nokubulawa kwabesifazane namantombazane.

src_text: ukuqalwa kwewoza matrics dale hes inkqubo yewoza matrics ijolise ekuncedeni bonke abafundi bematriki ukuba baphumelele iimviwo zabo zokuphela konyaka.
tgt_text: kwethulwe ngokusemthethweni uhlelo lwewoza matrics dale hes uhlelo lwewoza matrics kuhloswe ngalo ukusiza bonke abafundi bebanga lesi12 ukuthi bakwazi ukuphumelela izivivinyo zabo zokuphela konyaka.

src_text: abafundi bematriki balo nyaka bajongene nemingeni emikhulu ngenxa yesifo sentsholongwane icorona (icovid19).
tgt_text: abafundi bakama tikuletsheni bakulonyaka kumele babhekane nezingqinamba eziningi ngenxa yesifo segciwane lecorona (icovid19) .

src_text: isebe lemfundo esisiseko liqinisekisile ukuba ukuvulwa okukhuselekileyo kwezikolo yenye yezinto eziphambili nezibalulekileyo kulo, kunye nokuxhasa abafundi ngeenkqubo ezahlukileyo zokubanceda ukuba bawugqibe lo nyaka wezifundo ngempumelelo.
tgt_text: umnyango wemfundo eyisisekelo (idbe) ukuqinisekisile ukuthi ukuvulwa kabusha kwezikole ngendlela ephephile kungenye yezinto eziseqhulwini, ngokuhambisana nezinhlelo ezehlukene zokweseka abafundi ukuze basizakale ekutheni baqede ngempumelelo lo nyaka wokufunda.

src_text: enye yezi yinkqubo yewoza matrics, eza kuqaliswa ngomhla woku1 kweyomsintsi ngentsebenziswano namahlakani ezosasazo amaninzi kunye neengcali kwezemfundo.
tgt_text: olunye lwezinhlelo uhlelo lwewoza matrics , olwethulwa ngokusemthethweni mhla lulu1 kumandulo ngokusebenzisana nabahlanganyeli bezokusa kaza abaningi kanye nongcweti bezemfundo.

src_text: njengenxalenye yenkqubo, izifundo zokufumana okudlulileyo kwizifundo ezibalule kileyo ezintandathu zematri ki ezisasazwa kwasabc, dstv kunye neopenview (kuchannel 122) mihla yonke iiveki ezili12, ukususela ngentsimbi yesi8 ukuya kweye10 kusasa nentsimbi yoku1 ukuya kweyesi3 emva kwemini.
tgt_text: njengengxenye yohlelo, ukufundwa kwezifundo ezisilele emuva ezifundweni eziyisithupha nokuyizo eziyisisekelo kuzosakazwa emoyeni nsuku zonke isikhathi esingangamaviki ayi12 ez inkundleni zokusakaza isabc, idstv kanye nakuopenview (kwishaneli 122) , kusuka ngehora lesi8 kuya kwihora lesi10 ekuseni kuphinde kuqhubeke futhi ngehora loku1 kuya ngehora lesi3 ntambama.

src_text: iinjongo kukunceda abafundi ukuba balungiselele iimviwo zokuphela konyaka.
tgt_text: inhloso ukusiza abafundi balungiselele izivivinyo zabo zokuphela konyaka.

src_text: eli qonga likwabonelela ngezifundo ezisasazwa ngqo, apho abafundi banokubuza ootitshala imibuzo.
tgt_text: lesi sizindalwazi sohlelo siphinde sihlinzeke ngezifundo bukhoma, laphoke abafundi bezokwazi khona ukuba nethuba lokubuza imibuzo kothisha.

src_text: iingcebiso zeemviwo nazo zikhona.
tgt_text: sizophinde sihlinzeke ngamasu azosiza abafundi.

src_text: iwoza matrics iqaphele uku ba nangona bonke abafundi bephulukene nexesha lesikolo, abafundi bebanga le12ngabona bathe bachaphazeleka kakhulu, njengoko amanqa ku abo ebaluleke kakhulu ku makhondo abo nakumathuba okwamkelwa edyunivesithi.
tgt_text: iwoza matrics iye yakubona ukuthi ngesikhathi bonke abafundi belahlekelwe isikhathi sokufunda, ibanga lesi12 lona likhahlamezeke ngokudlulele, njengoba amamaki abo ebaluleke kakhulu kulokho abafisa ukuba yikho kusasa kanye nokuthi izicelo zabo zokufunda enyuvesi zamukelwe.

src_text: umphathiswa wemfundo esisiseko uangie motshekga uthi le nkqubo ibaluleke kakhulu, njengokuba kubekho ukuphazamiseka kwizifundo okubangelwe yicovid19 .
tgt_text: ungqongqoshe wemfundo eyisisekelo uangie motshekga uthi lolu hlelo lubaluleke kakhulu, ikakhulukazi uma ubheka umonakalo omkhulu odalwe yicovid19 .

src_text: "abafundi bematriki basoloko bekuxinzelelo, kodwa unyaka wama2020 unezinto ezininzi ezibangela uxinzelelo ezingaqhelekanga.
tgt_text: "umatikuletsheni uhlezi uza nobunzima, kodwa unyaka wezi2020 ubugcwele ubunzima obungajwayelekile.

src_text: ndifuna ukuvuyisana nabafundi bebanga le12 kunye neentsapho zabo ngonyamezelo kunye nokuzimisela.
tgt_text: ngifuna ukuhalalisela bonke abafundi bethu bebanga lesi12 kanye nemindeni yabo ngesineke kanye nokuzinikela kwabo.

src_text: kucace gca ukuba inkxaso eyongezelekileyo iyafuneka kubafundi kwaye siya kuqhuba nokubanika.
tgt_text: sekucace kwathi bha manje ukuthi ukwesekwa ngokwengeziwe kuyadingeka kulaba bafundi futhi sizoqhubeka sikuhlinzeke lokho.

src_text: kushiyeke iinyanga ezimbalwa ngaphambi kokuba unyaka uphele futhi iwoza matrics iza kunika abafundi inkxaso abayidingayo ukulungiselela iimviwo zokuphela konyaka," utshilo.
tgt_text: zincane kakhulu izinyanga ezisele manje ngaphambi kokuba kuphele lo nyaka futhi iwoza matrics izonika abafundi ukwesekwa abakudingayo ukuze balungiselele ukuvivinywa kwabo kokuphela konyaka," kusho yena.

src_text: le nkqubo yahlukile kuba ijolise kwinkoliso yabafundi bebanga le12 kwizwelonke abangenayo iintanethi kunye nezixhobo zokuqhagamshelana zobuchwepheshe.
tgt_text: lolu hlelo lwehlukile ngokuthi lubheke ikakhulu iningi lalabo bafundi bebanga lesi12 ezweni abangakwazi ukungena kuinthanethi manje namanje kanye nemishini yokuxhumana ngezobuchwepheshe bedijithali.

src_text: usasazo luza kufumaneka ukuba lubukelwe luninzi lwabafundi abasisigidi esi1.2 abaza kubhala iimviwo zematriki kweyenkanga.
tgt_text: izinhlelo zokusakaza zizotholakala ukuze zibukelwe yizigidi eziyi1.2 zabafundi ababhalela izivivinyo zabo zikamatikuletsheni ngolwezi.

src_text: ibhunga labaphathiswa bezemfundo libongoza bonke abafundi nabazali ukuba balisebenzise eli qonga.
tgt_text: umkhandlu wongqongqoshe bezemfundo unxenxa bonke abafundi kanye nabazali ukuba basisebenzise lesi sizindalwazi.

src_text: umphathi oyintloko wakwasabc umnu madoda mxakwe uthi eli qumrhu losasazo liyazingca ngokuba yinxalenye yeli phulo.
tgt_text: umphathi oyinhloko kwasabc umadoda mxakwe uthi umsakazo uyaziqhenya ngokuba yingxenye yalolu hlelo.

src_text: "siyavuya ukuba ngomnye wabadlala indima ephambili ekuqinisekiseni ukuba unya ka wama2020 wematriki awuhambi nje.
tgt_text: "kuyasithokozisa ukuba yingxenye yababambiqhaza ababalulekile ekuvikeleni ukulahleka konyaka kamatikuletsheni wonyaka wezi2020.

src_text: njengequmrhu losasazo loluntu, sinyanzelekile ukuba siqinisekise ukuba iinkqubo zethu zosasazo ziquka iinkqubo ezininzi ezinemfundiso, ingakumbi ngexesha apho oku kuyimfuneko kakhulu.
tgt_text: njengomsakazo osiza umphakathi, sizibophezele emsebenzini ukuqinisekisa ukuthi okuqukethwe ngumsakazo kubandakanya izinto ezibalulekile ezinhlelweni zokufundisa, ikakhulukazi ngesikhathi lapho kudingeka khona.

src_text: "imibuzo yakho iphendulekilezeziphi izifundo eziza kwenziwa?
tgt_text: "imibuzo yakho iphenduliweyiziphi izifundo ezizotholakala?

tgt_text: imaths igeography ilife sciences iphysical sciences iaccounting imaths literacy.

tgt_text: kungani kuqokwe lezi zikhathi, ngoba abafundi kungenzeka babe sesikoleni?

src_text: amaxesha okuya esikolweni ahlukile kwizithili nakumaphondo jikelele, ngenxa yamanyathelo okungasondelelani kwabantu.
tgt_text: izikhathi zokuya esikoleni ziyashiyana emikhandlwini kanye nasezifundazweni, ngenxa yokulandela izinyathelo zokuziqhelelanisa kubantu.

src_text: uninzi lwabafundi bematriki baza kuba semakhaya ngexesha losasazo lwezifundo.
tgt_text: baningi abafundi bakamatiku letsheni abazobe besemakhaya ngesikhathi sokusakaza.

src_text: abafundi abambalwa bafundela emakhaya.
tgt_text: lincane futhi iphesenti labafundi abafundela emakhaya.

src_text: usasazo olubalulekileyo luza kuphindwa ngentsimbi ye4 malanga kwiopenview futhi luyafumaneka kudstv catchup .
tgt_text: ukusakazwa kwempela kuzophindwa emva kwehora lesi 4 ntambama kwiopenview futhi kuzophinde kutholakale kudstv catchup .

src_text: kutheni abafundi bematriki kuphela?
tgt_text: kungani kuqokwe umatikuletsheni kuphela?

src_text: abafundi bematriki baphantsi koxinzelelo olukhulu lokucwangcisa ubomi babo emva kokuba besigqibile isikolo.
tgt_text: umatikuletsheni ungaphansi kwengcindezi yokuhlelela impilo yawo emva kokuqeda isikole.

src_text: abafundi bematriki bajongene nokuphazamiseka okumandla kwimfundo yabo ukususela kweyokwindla 2020 kuba ikharityhulamu yabo ayinqunyulwanga.
tgt_text: umatikuletsheni uye wabhekana nokuphazamiseka kakhulu ekufundeni kwawo ukusuka ngondasa kowezi2020 ngenxa yokuthi uhlelo lokufunda kwawo aluzange lwafinyezwa.

src_text: abafundi bematriki basemva kakhulu ngezifundo ngokwekharityhulamu.
tgt_text: umatikuletsheni usasalele emuva kakhulu kuhlelo lwawo lokufunda.

src_text: ndingayifumana phi ishedyuli yokujonga?
tgt_text: ngingazithola kuphi izikhathi zokubuka?

src_text: ishedyuli yamaxesha osasazo iyafumaneka kwisikhokelo setv kunye nakule webhusayithi yewoza matrics ethi wozamatrics.co.za.
tgt_text: izikhathi zokubuka ziyatholakala kwimihlahlandlela kamabonakude kanye nakuwebhusayithi yewoza matrics ethi: wozamatrics.co.za .

src_text: usasazo oluphindwayo nalo luza kubakhona.
tgt_text: izinhlelo zokusakaza eziphindayo zizotholakala.

src_text: ingaba abazali kunye notitshala bayayinikwa inkxaso?
tgt_text: ngakube lokhu kwesekwa kuhlinzekelwe abazali kanye nothisha?

src_text: ewe.
tgt_text: yebo.

src_text: ishedyuli yosasazo iza kuba neeseshoni zeengcebiso zabazali ngeendlela zokuxhasa abantwana babo abenza imatriki.
tgt_text: lezi zikhathi zokusakaza zizoba nesikhathi lapho kunikwa khona abazali amasu ngezindlela zokuthi abazali bangamuseka kanjani umntwana owenza umatikuletsheni.

src_text: ezinye iiseshoni ziza kujolisa kootitshala futhi iteacher connect whatsapp yesebe lemfundo esisiseko iza kuthumela imiyalezo ebalulekileyo kootitshala.
tgt_text: ezinye zalezi zikhathi zokusakaza zizogxila kothisha futhi inkundla yokuxhumana iwhatsapp yothisha bomnyango wemfundo eyisisekelo izothumela imilayezo ebalulekile kothisha.

src_text: ingaba kuya kugxilwa ekujonganeni noxinzelelo abafundi bematriki abajamelana nalo?
tgt_text: ngakube kuzokwenzeka yini ukuthi kugxilwe ekub hekaneni nobunzima obubhekene nomatikuletsheni?

src_text: ewe.
tgt_text: yebo.

src_text: kuza kubakho iiseshoni eziliqela ezijolise ekuboneleleni ngeengcebiso zempilo yabafundi, ukumelana noxinzelelo nokumelana nexhala.
tgt_text: kuzoba khona izikhathi zokusakaza lapho kuzogxilwa khona ekuhlinzekeni ngamasu okubhekana nempilo yomfundi, ukumelana nobunzima kanye nokulawula ixhala.

src_text: ngolwazi oluthe vetshe, yiya kwiwebhusayisithi yakwawoza matrics ethi wozamatrics.co.za okanye kwidilesi yeimeyile ethi:info@wozamatrics.co.za
tgt_text: kwethulwe ngokusemthethweni uhlelo lwewoza matrics dale hes uhlelo lwewoza matrics kuhloswe ngalo ukusiza bonke abafundi bebanga lesi12 ukuthi bakwazi ukuphumelela izivivinyo zabo zokuphela konyaka.

src_text: amajelo eendaba asemzantsi afrika ayintsika engundoqo kulawulo lwethu lwentando yesininzi vukuzenzele unnamed kumazwe amani nzi ehlabathini jikelele, ubhu bhane wentsholongwane icorona uye wafunisa uku ba kubekho ukuthintelwa kweenkululeko ezininzi kubemi waza wabeka intla lontle kuvavanyo.
tgt_text: abezindaba baseningizimu afrika bayinsika yentando yeningi labantu vukuzenzele unnamed emazweni amaningi emhlabeni jikelele, ubhubhane lwegci wane lecorona lunciphise inkululeko yomphakathi lwaphinde lwalinga ubu mbano lomphakathi.

src_text: kodwa kumazwe ana maziko awomeleleyo, iinkqubo zeenkundla ezi phaphileyo kunye namajelo eendaba awomeleleyo akwa zile ukuthintela ukusingelwa phantsi kwamalungelo olu ntu nokusetyenziswa gwenxa kwamagunya wombuso.
tgt_text: kodwa amazwe anezikhu ngo eziqinile, izinhlelo zobu lungiswa eziqaphile kanye nabezindaba abanamandla akwazile ukugwema ukuthi amalungelo abantu abukelwe phansi nokuhlukunyezwa kweziphathimandla zo mbuso.

src_text: sekuzinyanga zintandathu ukususela kwamiselwa isimo sentlekele sesizwe.
tgt_text: sekube yizinyanga ezi yisithupha selokhu kwame nyezelwa isimo senhlekelele kazwelonke.

src_text: nangona esi sifo singenakufaniswa nantoni na eyakhe yakhona ngaphambili nomngeni o mkhulu wokubeka ilizwe elinabantu abangama58 zezigidi phantsi kokuvalele ka phantsi kwemiqathango ethile, siqhube kakuhle.
tgt_text: ngaphezu kwesimo esingakaze sibonwe sesifo kanye nezingqinamba zokubeka izwe elinabantu abayizigidi ezingama58 ngaphansi kokuvalwa kwe zwe, senze kahle kakhulu.

src_text: sikwazile ukunqanda uku nwenwa kwesi sifo ekuqaleni ngenxa yentsebenziswano nokuphapha kwabo bonke abemi.
tgt_text: sikwazile ukunqanda uku bhebhetheka kwegciwane ikakhulukazi ngenxa yokuse benza ngokubambisana nokuqaphela kwazo zonke izakhamuzi.

src_text: oku kwenzeke ikakhulu ngenxa yomsebenzi omhle owenziwa ngamajelo wethu weendaba.
tgt_text: lokhu akuyona into enca ne ngenxa yokusebenza ngokuzikhandla kwa bezindaba bakithi.

src_text: kufanele sibulele ukusebe nza nzima komzantsi afrika kunye nokuzimisela koono ndaba.
tgt_text: kumele sizibonge kakhulu izintatheli ezisebenza kanzi ma nangokuzimelela zase ningizimu afrika.

src_text: bahlale bebazisa abantu bakuthi ngokusasaza imiyalezo yezempilo engu ndoqo malunga nokugcina umgama wokuqelelana ku nye nococeko.
tgt_text: bezilokhu zinikeza abantu bakithi ulwa zi ngokusabalalisa imiyalezo yezempilo yokuqhelelana kubantu kanye nenhlanzeko.

src_text: bakwenze oko phantsi kweemeko ezinzima kakhulu, kaninzi ngemitho mbo engonelanga.
tgt_text: zikwenze lokho ngaphansi kwezimo ezinzima, esikha thini esiningi nezinsizakuse benza zinganele.

src_text: babalise amabali ngemi phumela ukuvaleleka phantsi kwemiqathango ethile okunayo kubomi babantu namashishini wabo.
tgt_text: zisitshele ngezindaba zemiphumela yokuvalwa kwezwe ezimpilweni zabantu kanye nasemabhizinisini abo.

src_text: bebethe saa ezilalini, ezidolophini nasezixekweni, bezisa amabali angabantu nje besiqhelo betsalela ingqalelo yesizwe kwiingxaki ezenzeka ezibhedlele nasezikliniki, beqhuba urhulumente ukuba athathe amanyathelo.
tgt_text: beziphumile ziye emakhaya, emadolobheni nasemado lobhenikazi, ziletha izindaba zabantu abajwayelekile futhi zidonsa amehlo esizwe ezinkingeni okubhekenwe nazo ezibhedlela nasemitho lampilo, zigqugquzela ukuthi uhulumeni asukume.

src_text: amajelo wethu eendaba asazise nangokubaxeka engesingakhange sazi ngako phantsi kwemeko eqheleki leyo.
tgt_text: abezindaba bakithi basikha nyisele indlela ebesingeke siyibone nje.

src_text: bayifezekisile indima yabo yokubangukhala ngo kwazisa izenzo zorhwaphi lizo nolawulo olugwenxa, babangela kubekho iingxo xompikiswano yesizwe enkulu nokukhokelela kuninzi lophando lwabantu ababalulekileyo.
tgt_text: bayifezile indi ma yabo emphakathini ngokuvundulula izenzo zenkohlakalo nokunga phathi ngendlela, basusa inkulumompikiswano enku lu kuzwelonke ekuphenywe ni kwamacala asezingeni eliphezulu.

src_text: ngale ndlela yokwenza ingxelo bafumene ukuthenjwa ngabantu.
tgt_text: ngalokhu kubika kwabo sebezuze ukwethe njwa ngabantu.

src_text: ushicilelo olukhululekileyo alusiso isiphelo kulo.
tgt_text: inkululeko yabezindaba ayi yona isiphetho.

src_text: yindlela ekuqinisekiswa nekugcinwa ngayo ulawulo lwentando yesininzi.
tgt_text: ingukugcina nokuphakamisa intando yeningi labantu.

src_text: ngeli xesha lalo bhubhane, amajelo wethu eendaba awonelanga kuku dlala nje indima yesiqhe lo yokubangukhala, kodwa asebenzise umsebenzi wawo wokuba ngabemi ngokuxha sa ilinge lesizwe lokulawula intsholongwane icorona .
tgt_text: ngesikhathi salolu bhubhane, abezindaba bakithi abadlalanga nje indima yabo emphakathini eyaziwayo, kodwa benze umsebenzi womphakathi ekwesekeni umzamo ka zwelonke wokunqanda igci wane lecorona .

src_text: sikubonile ukubaluleka kwamajelo eendaba kwimpi lo yolawulo lwethu lwenta ndo yesininzi, yinkxalabo enkulu eyokuba njengakuwo onke amacandelo ezoqo qosho, intlekele yentsholo ngwane icorona iwachane kanobomi amaziko eendaba.
tgt_text: ngenxa yokubaluleka kwabezindaba ekuphileni kwentando yeningi yethu, kukhathaza kakhulu ukuthi njengayo yonke eminye imikhakha yomnotho, inkinga yegciwane lecorona ihlasele kanzima abezindaba.

src_text: amanye amaziko oshicilelo alahlekelwe ngumthamo ode wafikelela kuma60 eepesenti engeniso yawo kwiintsuku zokuqala zokuvaleleka phantsi kwemiqathango ethile.
tgt_text: ezinye izinkampani ezishicilelayo zilahlekelwe ingenisomali engamaphesenti angama60 ezinsukwini zokuqala zoku valwa kwezwe.

src_text: iinkampani ezininzi zide zanyanzeleka ukuba zibhenele ekuthotyweni kwemivuzo, ukunciphisa ina ni labasebenzi okanye uku cutha iiyure zokusebenza.
tgt_text: izinkampani eziningi kwamele zinciphise amaholo, zinciphise inani labasebenzi noma zinciphise amahora asetshenzwayo.

src_text: ngosizi, amanye amaziko oshicilelo ade anyanzeleka ukuba avale, phakathi kwawo zizihloko zemagazini eyazi wayo neyasekwa kwakudala yasemzantsi afrika.
tgt_text: okubuhlungu, ezinye izinkampani ezishicilelayo ziphoqeleke ukuthi zivalwe, phakathi kwazo nga maphephabhuku asungulwa kudala futhi aziwa kakhulu eningizimu afrika.

src_text: ukulahleka kwemisebenzi okubangelwe kukuvaleleka phantsi kwemiqathango ethile kuyenze mandu ndu intlekele yeenkampani zezendaba esele zijongene nemicelimngeni efana nokuphulukana nemali enge niswa kukwenziwa kwee ntengiso, ukuhla kwenani lamaphephandaba athengi swayo nezabelo zezorhwe bo esezithathwe kukuqala kwezixhobo eziphathwayo nobunye ubuchwephe she.
tgt_text: ukulahleka kwemisebenzi okubangelwe ukuvalwa kwezwe sekwandise inkinga yezinkampani zabezindaba ezivele zibhekene nezi nselele ezifana nezimali zokukhangisa, ukusatsha laliswa kwephephandaba kanye nesabelo semakethe esesihlwithwe izindaba ezikhishwa ngomakhale khukhwini nangobunye ubuchwepheshe.

src_text: ezi ngxaki zezezimali wonke umntu ujongene nazo, ukususela kwizihloko ezikuintanethi ukuya ku maxhwebhu abanzi esiqhelo ukuya kumaziko osasazo ka wonkewonke.
tgt_text: lezi zingqi namba zemali zihlasele yonke indawo, kusuka kuzindaba zakuinthanethi kuya kulwa zi olubhalwe ephepheni kuya kubasakazi.

src_text: lo ngomnye wemiba ethe yaphakanyiswa kabukhali ngexesha lothethathethwano lwam neqonga labahle li besizwe basemzantsi afri ka (isanef) kutsha nje.
tgt_text: lolu olunye lodaba olwa phakanyiswa ngesikhathi sezingxoxo zami zakamuva nje nenkundla kazwelonke yaseningizimu afrika yabahleli isouth african national editors’ forum.

src_text: endaweni yokusizela imeko yabo, noxa kunjalo, ushishino lwezendaba lusebenza nzima ukuphucula iindlela zezoshi shino, ukuqhuba ubuchule kunye nokugcina abasebenzi kangangoko lunako.
tgt_text: esikhundleni sokubalisa ngekusasa labo, kunalokho, imboni yabezindaba isebenza kanzima ukuhlela kabusha ibhizinisi, ukuza nezindlela ezintsha kanye nokugcina abasebenzi ngayo yonke indlela.

src_text: kwangaxesha nye, ijelo leendaba liqumrhu elilodwa kulo naluphi na uluntu kuba abasebenzi balo bazalisekisa indima ebaluleke kakhulu kulawulo lwentando yethu yesininzi.
tgt_text: ngaso leso sikhathi, abezindaba bayibhizinisi elehlukile kunoma imuphi umphakathi ngenxa yokuthi abasebenza kulona bafezekisa indima ebaluleke kakhulu kwintando yeningi labantu.

src_text: umsebenzi walo kukugcina uluntu luso loko lusazi kwaye lugcina abasemagunyeni bephantsi kweliso.
tgt_text: basebenza ukugcina umpha kathi unolwazi nokugcina abaphethe emgqeni.

src_text: sidinga iintatheli ezininzi, hayi ezimbalwa.
tgt_text: sidinga izintatheli eziningi, hhayi ezimbalwa.

src_text: kungoko ke ukulahlekelwa yintatheli nje enye asiyolahleko nje kolu shishino kodwa yilahleko kwisizwe jikelele.
tgt_text: yingakho nje ukulahlekelwa ngisho yi ntatheli eyodwa kungalahle kelwa imboni kuphela kodwa silahlekelwa njengezwe.

src_text: sidinga amagqala wethu kumajelo eendaba, aza kunye namava amaninzi neenkumbulo zeziko, kwaye nakwaziyo ukubonelela ngokunika ingxelo ehlaba amadlala nophononongo olusemxholweni.
tgt_text: sidinga omakadebona bezintatheli bakithi, aba zoletha isipiliyoni kanye nezikhumbuzo zabezindaba, futhi abazokwazi ukuletha imibiko ebucayi nenolwazi.

src_text: kwangaxe sha nye sidinga iintatheli ezi selula ezininzi kweli khondo nanolwazi lobuchwepheshe, anolwazi oluhambelana nala maxesha ekubaliseni amabali kwaye ezinolwazi ngeenkxa labo zolutsha.
tgt_text: ngaso leso sikhathi sidinga izintatheli eziningi ezisenca ne ezazi ezobuchwepheshe, ezihambisana nezindlela ezintsha zokuxoxa izindaba futhi ezixhumene nezinkinga ezibhekene nentsha.

src_text: njengoluntu amajelo eendaba adinga inkxaso yethu.
tgt_text: njengomphakathi kumele seseke ngokuphelele abezindaba.

src_text: nokuba kungokukhe tha ukuhlawulela umxholo, ngokuxhasa ubuntatheli obuhlawulelwa igquba, ngokuhlawula umrhumo welayisenisi yeziko losasazo lomzantsi afrika (isabc) okanye njengokuthenga iphe phandaba, sonke singadlala indima yethu ukuxhasa olu shishino lukwintlekele.
tgt_text: noma ngabe kumele sikhethe ukuthi si khokhele okuqukethwe izindaba, ukusekela izinta theli ezixhaswe ngeminikelo yomphakathi, ukukhokhela amalayisensi akwasabc noma nje ngokuthenga iphe phandaba, sonke singadlala indima yethu ukwesekela le mboni esenkingeni.

src_text: nje ngorhulumente, nangona ime ko yezoqoqosho imfiliba nje siza kuqhubeka ukwandisa inkcitho yokwenza iintengiso kushicilelo nakusasazo, inga kumbi kumajelo eendaba oluntu.
tgt_text: njengo hulumeni, ngaphezu kwesimo somnotho ontengantengayo sizoqhubeka nokukhangisa kulabo abashicilelayo na basakazayo, ikakhulukazi abezindaba basemphakathini.

src_text: namacandelo abucala ku funeka nawo aqhubeke uku xhasa olu shishino ngokwe nza iintengiso nokusebenzi sana namaziko ezendaba eku veliseni umxholo onobuchule ngokuhambelana nentsingi selo yamajelo eendaba ehla bathini jikelele.
tgt_text: umkhakha ozimele kumele nawo uqhubeke nokweseka le mboni ngokukhangisa kanye nokusebenzisana nabezinda ba ekukhiqizeni izindaba ezi ntsha ezisezingeni lomhlaba.

src_text: abathandi babantu balapha ekhaya nemibutho yesisa kufanele nayo izeke mzekweni ize ixhase amalinge obuntatheli obukwimfuno yoluntu, njengoko kunjalo kumazwe amaninzi aphantsi kolawulo lwentando yesininzi.
tgt_text: labo abanesihe balapha ekhaya kanye nezinhlangano ezinikelayo kumele nabo bangenelele basekele amabhi zinisi abezindaba, njengoba kunjalo kwintando yeningi labantu.

src_text: ukwanda kweendaba zobuxoki ngeli xesha lika bhubhane, okuqala ku maqonga ezonxulumelwano, kukwandisile ukungxamise ka kokufuneka kweendaba ezongezelelweyo eziyinyani so, ezingenamkhethe nezi ngakhethi cala.
tgt_text: ukwanda kwezindaba ezi ngelona iqiniso ngesikhathi sobhubhane, ikakhulukazi ezinkundleni zokuxhumana, kwengeze isidingo esiphuthu mayo sezindaba eziningi ezinembayo, ezilungile futhi ezingathathi cala.

src_text: ngeli xesha abantu bakuthi baxhomekeke kumaziko wethu weendaba asekiweyo ukufumana ulwazi, kwakhona ukugxi ninisa ukubaluleka kwawo njengeentsika zolawulo lwentando yesininzi.
tgt_text: ngalesi sikhathi abantu bakithi bathembele kwabezindaba ngolwazi, futhi sibukela phansi ukubaluleka kwabo njengezinsika zentando yeningi labantu.

src_text: njengoko siqalisa umse benzi omkhulu wokwakha uqoqosho lwethu emva kwesiphumo sikabhubhane, ushishino lwezeendaba luza kuyidinga kakhulu ngoku inkxaso yethu kunangapha mbili.
tgt_text: njengoba siqala umsebenzi omkhulu wokwakha kabu sha umnotho wethu emva kwemiphumela yobhubhane, imboni yabezindaba izodinga ukuthi siyisekele kakhulu kunakuqala.

src_text: ushicilelo olukhulule kileyo lwalusakuchazwa ‘nje ngomalusi ongalaliyo walo naliphi na ilungelo amadoda nabantu basetyhini abakhu lulekileyo abawaxabisileyo.’ njengokuba siyothulela umnqwazi indima yalo kulo bhubhane, masenze konke okusemandleni wethu ukuqinisekisa ukuba ama jelo eendaba akhululekileyo nantlobontlobo kwilizwe lethu ayakwazi ukuphila aze aphumelele.
tgt_text: abezindaba baseningizimu afrika bayinsika yentando yeningi labantu vukuzenzele unnamed emazweni amaningi emhlabeni jikelele, ubhubhane lwegci wane lecorona lunciphise inkululeko yomphakathi lwaphinde lwalinga ubu mbano lomphakathi.

src_text: ukwenza inguqu kwicandelo lezolimo vukuzenzele unnamed kutsha nje, isebe lezolimo, ukubuyekezwa komhlaba nophu hliso lwamaphandle (idlrd) libhengeze ukuba abantu baza ku kwazi ukufaka izicelo zokuba baqeshe umhlaba karhulumente ozii hektare ezingama700 000 ongasetyenziswa ngokwaneleyo okanye ongenanto kumapho ndo asixhenxe.
tgt_text: ukuguqula umkhakha wezolimo vukuzenzele unnamed kamuva nje, umnyango wezolimo, ukuguqulwa komhlaba kanye nokuthuthukiswa kwezindawo zasemakhaya (idlrd) wamemezela ukuthi amalungu omphakathi azokwazi ukufaka izicelo zokuqasha umhlaba wombuso ongamahe ktha ayizi700 000 ongasetshenziswa noma ohleli nje ezifundazweni eziyisikhombisa.

src_text: umhlaba wokulima usisise ko somthombo wethu wenda lo.
tgt_text: ezolimo ziyinsika yesisekelo sokumbiwa phansi kwe mvelo.

src_text: ukuze sikwazi ukuphila kufuneka kubekho umhlaba wokulima nokufuya futhi usetyenziswe ngononophelo.
tgt_text: ukuba khona nokuse tshenziswa okusimeme kwendawo yokulima izitshalo nokufuya izilwane sizonqoba ngakho.

src_text: umzantsi afrika unemimadla yomhlaba otyebileyo olungele iimveliso zezolimo, kangangokuba sithetha nje umhlaba weli ongama37,9% usetyenziselwa amaphulo ezolimo lwentengo.
tgt_text: iningizimu afrika inomhlaba omningi kakhulu olungele umkhiqizo wezolimo, ama37.9% omhlaba wethu wonke njengamanje usetshenziselwa ezolimo ukuze kuthengiswe.

src_text: njengamanye amazwe amaninzi, umhlaba wethu wokulima usemngciphe kweni wokuphelelwa lixabi so, ukunqatyelwa ngamanzi kunye nokungenelela kwee dolophu kuwo.
tgt_text: njengamanye amazwe, umhlaba wethu ovundile usengcupheni yokuncipha kokuvunda, ukungabi namanzi ngokwanele kanye nokusetshenziswa komhlaba ukwakha kuwona.

src_text: sikwaphu lukana nomhlaba wokulima obalulekileyo kuba utshi ntshwa usetyenziselwe izinto ezingadibananga nolimo.
tgt_text: siphinde silahlekelwe umhlaba wokulima omkhulu kakhulu ngenxa yezinguquko ekusetshe nzisweni komhlaba.

src_text: njengoko sonke siyazi imbali yeli lizwe, ke ngoko ukukhokelisa njengomba ophambili kwisizwe ukufikelela kumhlaba wokulima ukwenzela iimveliso zezo rhwebo futhi nokulimela uku zondla kubalulekile.
tgt_text: uma sibheka umlando wethu, ukunweba ukufinyelela emhlabeni wokulima imikhiqizo ezothengiswa nokulimela ukuziphilisa kuyinto eseqhulwini kuzwelonke.

src_text: nangona iinkqubo zokuthathwa nokubuyiswa ko mhlaba ezaqala emva ko nyaka we1994 zakhokelela ekubeni umhlaba omninzi ubuyiselwe kubantu aba ntsundu bomzantsi afri ka, umonakalo owenziwa ngumthetho womhlaba wabantu bomthonyama wowe1913 usabonakala nangoku kubuninimhlaba wasezifama.
tgt_text: yize uhlelo lokuguqulwa komhlaba lwangasemva kowe1994 luholele ekubu yisweni komhlaba omningi wabuyiselwa kubantu aba nsundu baseningizimu afrika, umphumela oyingozi womthetho wangowe1913 womhlaba wabomdabu uyaqhubeka nokubonakala ebunikazini bomhlaba wokulima.

src_text: lo mthetho zange ususe nje izigidi zabantu kumhlaba wokhokho babo wade wa gqithisa.
tgt_text: lo mthetho waqhubeka na ngaphezu kokuphuca izigidi zabantu umhlaba wokhokho babo.

src_text: njengoko umhlaba usesezandleni zegcuntswana labantu, futhi iimveliso zezolimo zokuqala kunye nawo onke amashishini asebenzisanayo ngazo asaphethwe ngamafama orhwe bo amhlophe, loo nto ithetha ukuba iziphumo zomonakalo wangaphambili zisabonakala nanamhlanje.
tgt_text: njengoba ubunikazi bomhlaba busesezandleni zabayidlanzana, nokukhiqizwa kwezolimo okukhulu nemisebenzi ehambisana nokukhiqizwa iphethwe ngabalimi abamhlo phe, imiphumela ye sikhathi sethu esedlule isalokhu inathi namuhla.

src_text: ukuqhubeka kokuxhamla kwegcuntswana kuphela kumthombo ongundoqo wokuvelisa ofana nomhlaba ayingomqobo nje kuphela othintela ukuqhubela pha mbili ngakumbi ukuxhasa isizwe sone; ikwayingxaki enokubangela ukuba abantu bade bavukele umbuso.
tgt_text: ukuqhubeka nokubusa wedwa emikhiqizweni eba lulekile njengomhlaba akusiso nje isithikamezo ekwenzeni ngcono umphakathi oli nganayo; kuzodala inxu shunxushu emphakathini.

src_text: inani labantu abalambela ukuba nomhlaba babe ngamafama liyakhula, ingakumbi kubantu abangathathi ntweni basemaphandleni.
tgt_text: ukulambela umhlaba wokulima kuyakhula, ikakhulukazi kulabo abadla imbuya ngothi emakhaya.

src_text: kwaye ngenxa yezizathu ezithile, isantya sokubuyiselwa ko mhlaba kweli candelo siha mba kancinci futhi ngendlela engamkelekilyo.
tgt_text: ngezizathu eziningi, ukuguqulwa ko mhlaba kulo mkhakha ku hamba ngonyawo lonwabu futhi akugculisi.

src_text: ukwenza inguqu kwimbonakalo yobuninimhlaba wezolimo kubalulekile kungenzelwa nje ukulungisa intswela bulungisa yembali yangapha mbili, kodwa oku kwenzelwa ukuqinisekisa ngokhuseleko lokubakho kokutya okwaneleyo kwisizwe sakowethu.
tgt_text: ukuguqula ukuphathwa kobunikazi bomhlaba wokulima kubaluleke kakhulu hhayi nje ukuze kubhekanwe no mlando ongenabulungiswa, kodwa ukuze sivikele ukuphepha kokudla kwesizwe sethu.

src_text: njengoko kuqatshelwe kwingxelo yowama2019 yeqela labacebisi bakamo ngameli elijongene nokubu yiselwa komhlaba nezolimo ukuba, "nangona sithumela ukutya kumazwe angapha ndle, apha ekhaya abantu basemaphandleni abangama41% kunye nabasezi dolophini abangama59,4% bathwaxwa yingxaki yoku nqongophala kakhulu koku tya.
tgt_text: njengoba kubekiwe embi kweni wangowezi2019 wesi gungu eseluleka umongameli ngokuguqulwa komhlaba kanye nezolimo, "ngesikhathi thina sithumela ukudla kwamanye amazwe, emuva ekhaya abantu abangama41% ezindaweni zasemakhaya kanye nabangama59.4% emadolobheni abafinyeleli ngokwanele ekudleni."

src_text: "uhlaziyo lezolimo ibisoloko ingumba ophambili wolawulo olulandelelanayo ukusukela oko sabaphantsi kolawulo lwentando yesininzi.
tgt_text: ukuguqulwa kwezolimo bekulokhu kuseqhulwini kubaphathi abalandelanayo kusukela kwintando yeningi labantu.

src_text: phakathi kowe1994 nenya nga yokwindla yowama2018, umbuso unike abantu ababehlelelekile ngaphambili u mhlaba ozihekthare ezizigidi ezisi8,4 phantsi kwenkqubo yokubuyiswa komhlaba.
tgt_text: phakathi kowe1994 nondasa kowezi2018 uhulu meni unikeze amahektha omhlaba ayizigidi eziyisi8.4 kubantu abebencishwe amathuba ngaphansi kohlelo lokuguqulwa komhlaba.

src_text: noko kunjalo, lo mhlaba sele unikezelwe ungaphantsi kwe10% zawo wonke u mhlaba wokulima wobufama bentengo.
tgt_text: kodwa le nqubekelapha mbili ilingana nokungaphansi kwe10% komhlaba ophelele wokulima.

src_text: ngethuba ndisenza intetho engobume besizwe ekuqaleni kwalo nyaka ndathembisa ukuba umhlaba karhulumente wokulima uza kukhululelwa ukuba kwenziwe ukufama kuwo.
tgt_text: enkulumweni yami yesimo sezwe ekuqaleni kwalo nyaka ngazibophezela ukuthi umhlaba wokulima ongapha nsi kukahulumeni uzodede lwa maduze ukuze kulinywe.

src_text: le ibe yimpumelelo elibalulekileyo kwinkqubo yohlaziyo lwezemihlaba, kwaye kuzalisekisa isithembiso esasenziwe kumqulu wenkululeko wokuba umhlaba kuza kwabelwana ngawo ngabo bawusebenzayo.
tgt_text: lokhu kuyingqophamla ndo ohlelweni lokuguqulwa kwezolimo, futhi lugcina isithembiso esikusomqulu wenkululeko esithi umhlaba kuzokwabelwana ngawo kulabo abasebenza kuwona.

src_text: umbono wethu wokubu yisela umhlaba uneenjongo zokuqinisekisa ukuba kukho ukulingana phakathi kobulungisa kwezentlalo noku lungiswa umonakalo wanga phambili, kwaye kwandiswa imveliso yezolimo ngokuthi kufakwe amafama amnyama kumacandelo angundoqo namakhulu ezoqoqosho.
tgt_text: umbono wethu wokuphi nde kwabiwe umhlaba uhlose ukulinganisa phakathi kobulungiswa kwezenhlalo noku lungisa, nokukhulisa imi khiqizo yezolimo ngokuletha abalimi abansundu abaningi emnothweni omkhulu.

src_text: umhlaba bubutyebi obu ngenisa inzuzo obunokuse tyenziswa njengesibambiso xa umntu efuna ukuthenga into ethile enexabiso.
tgt_text: umhlaba uyifa eliletha inzuzo futhi ungasetshenzi swa njengesibambiso ukuzu za elinye ifa.

src_text: kufuneka siqinisekise ukuba umhlaba ofunyanelwe ukufama usetyenziswa nge ndlela enemveliso.
tgt_text: kumele siqinisekise ukuthi umhlaba odingekayo ukuze kulinywe usetshenziswa ngendlela enenzuzo.

src_text: ukukhu sela umhlaba karhulumente onikezelelwe ngeenjongo zokufama, isivumelwano sokuqesha umhlaba asidluliselwa komnye umntu.
tgt_text: ukuze siqaphe umhlaba onikeziwe kahulumeni ukuze kuli nywe kuwona, isivumelwano sokuwuqasha asidluliseleki komunye umuntu.

src_text: abo bafumana umhlaba baza kutyikitya isivumelwano sokuqesha umhlaba norhulumente bahlale imali yokuqe sha loo mhlaba ngokwexabiso lawo elaziwayo.
tgt_text: abazu zile bazosayina isivumelwano sokuqasha nohulumeni bese bekhokha imali yokuqasha elingana nenani lomhlaba.

src_text: kufuneka siqinisekise kwa khona ukuba amafama afu mana inkxaso xa ezama uku ba amashishini awo anozinzo kwaye enza nengeniso.
tgt_text: kumele futhi siqinisekise ukuthi abalimi bayasekelwa baze basimame futhi benze inzuzo.

src_text: njengenxalenye yale nkqubo, abaxhamli baza kufumana uqeqesho ngeza khono zolawulo lwezimali kunye nophuhliso lwama shishini asakhulayo.
tgt_text: njengengxenye yalolu hlelo, abazuzile bazoqeqeshwa ngokulawula izimali kanye nokuthuthukiswa kwamabhizinisi.

src_text: ama va angaphambili asibonisa ukuba amafama asakhasayo namancinci kumaxa amaninzi awabinazo izakhono zezimali ukuze akwazi ukusebenzisa amathuba akhoyo kurhwebo nokusebenzisana namanye amashishini akweli candelo.
tgt_text: isikhathi esidlule sibonise ukuthi abalimi abasafufusa nabasebancane ba jwayele ukuswela amakhono kwezezimali ukubhekana namathuba ezimakethe kanye nokuzihlanganisa nokwenziwa kwemikhiqizo.

src_text: siwuthatha njengomba ophambili ukuqala ngabantu basetyhini, ulutsha kunye nabantu abakhubazekileyo njengabaxhamli kule nkqubo.
tgt_text: sibeke eqhulwini abesifazane, intsha kanye nabantu abaphila nokukhubazeka njengabantu abazozuza.

src_text: sibone iziphumo ezincumisayo kumaphulo ethu okuxhobisa abantu basetyhini abangamafama phantsi kwale nkqubo ikhoyo yepro active acquisition strategy (iplas).
tgt_text: sekube nempumelelo ebonakalayo ngokuhlomisa abalimi besifazane ngaphansi kwesu lokutholwa komhlaba ipro active land acquisition strategy (iplas).

src_text: kumaphondo amaninzi, abantu basetyhini abanikwe iifama yidlrd bakwazile ukuziqhuba ngempumelelo kwaye bakwazi nokunyukela kwinqanaba lokuvelisela ukurhweba.
tgt_text: ezifundazweni eziningi, abesifazane asebenikwe amapulazi yidlrd bakwazile ukuwaqhuba ngempumelelo futhi sebedlulele ekukhiqizeni imikhiqizo ethengiswayo.

src_text: ukongeza kumba wokufumaneka komhlaba ngokwawo, eli sebe liyaqhubeka nokutyala imali kwiziseko ezingundoqo, izixhobo zokusebenza kunye noomatshini ukuze kuncedwe aba somashishini bancinci ukuze baqhube ushishino lwabo ngokuyimpumelelo.
tgt_text: ukwengeza ekutholweni komhlaba ngokwawo, u mnyango uyaqhubeka no kutshala izimali kwingqala sizinda, izinsizakusebenza nemishini ukuze labo somabhizinisi abancane bezokwazi ukuqhuba amabhizinisi aphumelelayo.

src_text: ukunabisa ukufumaneka komhlaba namathuba okuba ngamafama kuza kudala imisebenzi nophuhliso lwama shishini amancinci, kuze kuphucule nenani labantu abathenga ukutya, iimveliso kunye neenkonzo zezolimo.
tgt_text: ukusabalalisa ukufinyelela emhlabeni nasemathubeni okulima kuzosekela ukusu ngulwa kwemisebenzi kanye nokuthuthukiswa kwama bhizinisi, futhi kuthuthukisa imakethe yokudla, izimpahla zolimo kanye nezinsiza.

src_text: eyona njongo iphambili yokukhululela lo mhlaba ebantwini kukwenza iinguqu kwezolimo ngokuthi kwandiswe isizukulwana samafama amatsha.
tgt_text: inhloso enkulu yokudedela lezi ziqephu zomhlaba ngukuguqula isimo sezolimo ngokukhulisa isizukulwane esisha sabalimi.

src_text: ukuqeshisa ngomhlaba phantsi kwemeko elula ngolu hlobo kufanele kubahlupheze batsho babe namaphupha amakhulu; bangazameli nje ukukhulisa awabo amashishini koko baqhubele phambili ubutyebi bokwabelana nokuhluma koluntu kwiindawo abaqhuba ukufama kuzo,kufuneka bapholise iya ntlukwano yangaphambili.
tgt_text: ukuqasha umhlaba ngaphansi kwezimo ezivunayo kumele kubenze bacabange okukhulu; hhayi nje ukukhulisa amabhizinisi abo kodwa ukwenza ngcono ingcebo okwabelwana ngayo kanye nokuchuma emiphakathini abalima kuyona.

src_text: kufuneka baluphikise olu luvo lungenabunyani lokuba ngamafama amhlophe kuphela emzantsi afrika anamashishini aqhuba kaku hle kakhulu kwezentengo nokuba amafama angabantu abantsundu akuhlala ’ekhasa’.
tgt_text: kumele bapholise ama nxeba obandlululo lwesikhathi sethu esedlule.

src_text: ngokusebenza lo mhlaba, ukuwuguqula ube ngove lisayo, baya kuba ngoku yinene bafezekisa amaphupha okujika izikrweqe zokulwa zibe ngamakhuba okusebenza umhlaba.
tgt_text: kumele bayichithe inkolelo ethi abalimi abamhlophe kuphela abaphumelelayo ekuthengiseni eningizimu afrika, nokuthi abalimi aba nsundu bahlale 'befufusa.

src_text: baya kuba ngumzekelo woxolelwaniso lwesizwe.
tgt_text: ukuguqula umkhakha wezolimo vukuzenzele unnamed kamuva nje, umnyango wezolimo, ukuguqulwa komhlaba kanye nokuthuthukiswa kwezindawo zasemakhaya (idlrd) wamemezela ukuthi amalungu omphakathi azokwazi ukufaka izicelo zokuqasha umhlaba wombuso ongamahe ktha ayizi700 000 ongasetshenziswa noma ohleli nje ezifundazweni eziyisikhombisa.

src_text: ukuvuselela uqoqosho olusebenzayo vukuzenzele unnamed ukuphehlelelwa kwesicwa ngciso sika mongameli sokudala imisebenzi kwiveki ephelileyo kubonise utshintsho olukhulu kwindlela yethu yoku lwa nentswelangqesho.
tgt_text: sivuselela umnotho osebenzayo vukuzenzele unnamed ukwethulwa komzamo kamongameli wokusungula imisebenzi ngesonto eledlule kuwuphawu lomnyakazo oyisisekelo ekubhe kaneni kwethu noku swelakala kwemisebe nzi.

src_text: senza utyalomali loluntu olukhuthazayo noluchaphazela abantu abaninzi kwiza khono nolwazi lwabantu, apho urhulumente njengomvelisi kunye nomenzi wemisebenzi.
tgt_text: sithatha igxathu elifinyelela kude nelivelele lokutshala izimali zikahulumeni kuba ntu, ngokuthi uhulumeni abe ngumsunguli futhi abe ngumhlinzeki wemisebe nzi.

src_text: isicwangciso sikamongameli sokudala imisebenzi asizange senziwe ngaphambili ngokobukhulu nangokobubanzi baso, kuquka utyalomali loluntu lweebhiliyoni ezilir100 zeerandi kule minyaka mithathu izayo.
tgt_text: umzamo kamongameli wokusungula imisebenzi uyingqayizivele ngobubanzi bawo, ubandakanya utshalomali lukahulumeni oluyizigi digidi eziyir100 eminyakeni emithathu ezayo.

src_text: siza kuyikhusela futhi siyivelise imisebenzi exhaswa ngezimali ngokuthe ngqo kunye nenkxaso yokuphila ngelixa imarike yezabasebenzi ibuyela kwimeko yesiqhelo kulo bhubhane wentsholo ngwane icorona.
tgt_text: sizovikela futhi sisungule imisebenzi exhaswe ngqo kanye nokungenelela ekwesekeni izindlela zokuziphi lisa ngesikhathi imakethe yezabasebenzi isalulama kubhubhane lwegciwane lecorona.

src_text: nganye kwezi ikulungele uku phunyezwa, futhi yongezwa kwizibophelelo ezikhoyo.
tgt_text: konke lokhu sekume ngomumo ukuthi kuqale ukusebenza, futhi kwengeza ezibophezelweni ezikhona.

src_text: ngelixa amanye ama ngenelelo esakha kwiinkqubo ezikhoyo ezinamandla, ukuvuselela kukwaquka iindlela ezintsha kunye nokuqaliswa kwezinto ezintsha.
tgt_text: ngesikhathi ezinye izi ndlela zokungenelela za khela phezu kwamandla ezinhlelo ezivele zikhona, lo mzamo nawo ubandakanya izindlela ezintsha nezisu ngulwe kabusha.

src_text: oku kuquka ukugxila kwinto esiyibize ngokuba 'kukuqeshwa koluntu'.
tgt_text: lokhu kubandakanya ukugxila kwesikubiza 'ngokuqashwa komphakathi'.

src_text: sisebenza kuluvo lokuba akukho kunqongophala komsebenzi ekufuneka kwenziwe ukulu ngisa iingxaki ezininzi zolu ntu kwiindawo esihlala kuzo.
tgt_text: sisebenzela phezu kokuthi awukho umsebenzi ongenziwa ukubhekana nezinkinga zenhlalo eziningi emphakathini wethu.

src_text: injongo kukuxhasa ubuchule obukhulu bokuyila, izakhono zenyathelo lokuqala kunye nezeziko elikhoyo kuluntu ngokubanzi ukubandakanya abantu kumsebenzi onenzuzo kumntu wonke.
tgt_text: inhloso ngukuseka amakho no okudala, okusungula ka nye nawezikhungo akhona emphakathini ngobubanzi ukusebenzisana nabantu abenza umsebenzi ofanayo omuhle.

src_text: lo mse benzi uchaphazela uluhlu lwemixholo emininzi, equka ukhuseleko lokutya, ukuphe liswa kobundlobongela obuse kelwe kwisini, ukuphuculwa kweendawo zoogobityholo nokunye okuninzi.
tgt_text: lo msebenzi ugamanxa ezinhlakeni ezihlukahlukene, kubandaka nya ukuvikeleka kokudla, ukuqeda udlame olubhekiswe kwabobulili obuthile, ukuthuthukiswa kwemijo ndolo nokunye.

src_text: oku kuza kongeza iinzame zecandelo likarhulumente, elivumela ukubandakanywa kwabantu abaninzi kunye nefuthe lezentlalo kunye neendlela ezintsha zobambiswano nabantu abohlukeneyo ababandakanyekayo kwezentlalo.
tgt_text: lokhu kuzohambisana nemizamo yomkhakha kahulumeni, okuzovumela ubukhulu nokuthinteka kwenhlalo kanjalo nokwakheka kobudlelwano obusha nababambiqhaza abehlukene emphakathini.

src_text: isicwangciso siquka inkqubo entsha yesizwe yokuqesha ootitshala nabancedisi bezikolo ezikolweni.
tgt_text: umzamo wokusungula imisebenzi ubandakanya uhlelo olusha lukazwelonke lokuqasha abasizi bothisha nabezikole ezikoleni.

src_text: izikolo ziyaqesha ngoku, zibonelela ngamathuba amatsha kulu ntu lonke kubude nobubanzi belizwe.
tgt_text: izikole kuyimanje ziyaqasha, zethula amathuba amasha kuyo yonke imiphakathi kulolonke izwe.

src_text: ukuqeshwa koluntu asingomsebenzi onge nasakhono kuphela.
tgt_text: ukuqashwa komphakathi akuwona nje umsebenzi ongenakhono.

src_text: kukho ukugxila okuchaphazela abo banezidanga, ngamathuba kubongikazi, abanezidanga kwezenzululwazi, amagcisa kunye nabanye.
tgt_text: kugxilwe kakhulu kulabo abaneziqu, abanamathuba obuhlengikazi, abaneziqu zesayensi, abanamakhono omsebenzi wezandla kanye nabanye.

src_text: isicwangciso kwakhona siza kukhusela imisebenzi kumacandelo asemngciphekweni athe antlithwa ngulo bhu bhane.
tgt_text: umzamo wokusungula imisebenzi uzophinde uvikele imisebenzi emikha kheni entekenteke eshayeke kanzima ngubhubhane.

src_text: inkxaso iza kunike zelwa kumagcisa ophuhliso lwabantwana abasakhulayo, ingakumbi amanina azisebenzelayo.
tgt_text: ukwesekwa kuzohli nzekelwa abasebenzi bo kuthuthukisa ukukhuliswa kwabantwana, ikakhulukazi abesifazane abaziqashe bona.

src_text: angaphezulu kwama74,000 amafama amancinci aza kuzifumana nawo izibonelelo zongenelo lwemveliso.
tgt_text: abalimi abancane abanga phezu kwezi74 000 nabo bazohlomula ezibonelelweni zomkhiqizo.

src_text: njengesizwe, sifuna ubugcisa kunye nenkcubeko ukuvuselela imimoya yethu kwakhona – isicwangciso sinikezela ngenkxasomali entsha ukunceda icandelo ukuba libuyele esimeni salo, kuquka nenkxaso yokuvelisa umxholo wedijithali kunye nokwandiswa kwamaqonga orhwebo ngeintanethi.
tgt_text: njengesizwe, sidinga ubuciko nesiko ukuphakamisa umoya wethu futhi umzamo wokusungula imisebenzi uhlinzeka ngoxhasomali olusha oluzosiza ukuthi umkhakha ubuyele uzimele, kubandakanya ukweseka ukusungulwa kolwazi ngedijithali kanye nokwandisa izinkundla zokuthengiselana ngeinthanethi.

src_text: oku kuza kwenza ukuba amagcisa akwazi ukuziqhelanisa neemeko ezintsha zorhwebo ezenziwe ngulo bhubhane kuthi sonke futhi athathe la mathuba matsha okukhula.
tgt_text: lokhu kuzovumela amaciko ukuthi ashintshele kuzimo ezintsha zemakethe ezilethwe ngubhubhane kithina nokubamba amathuba amasha ukuze akhule.

src_text: isibonelelo esibalulekileyo esibanzi sokudala imisebenzi, esenziwe sabaluleka nga kumbi ngenxa yalo bhubha ne, lunxibelelwano.
tgt_text: umsunguli obucayi wemisebenzi eminingi, owenziwe wabaluleka kakhulu ngenxa yobhubhane, ukuxhumana.

src_text: ukoyisa iyantlukwano yedijithali, ukuvuselela kuza kunikezela ngeintanethi ehamba ngesa ntya esiphezulu ngexabiso eli phantsi, kumakhaya afumana imivuzo ephantsi ngendlela yeenkxaso yonxibelelwano loqaliso lwezinto ezintsha kunye nokwandiswa kwe wifi yasimahla yoluntu.
tgt_text: ukunqoba ukwahlukana kwezedijithali, lo mzamo uzohlinzeka ngesivinini sokusebenza kweinthanethi, esingabizi kakhulu kuma khaya anemalingeniso enca ne ngokusebenzisa uxhaso olusha lwezokuxhumana nokufakwa kwewifi yamahhala emphakathini.

src_text: njengokuba ilizwe lethu libuyela kwimeko yesiqhelo emva yentshabalalo yalo bhubhane wentsholongwane icorona, asithandabuzi ngobukhulu bomsebenzi ophambi kwethu.
tgt_text: njengoba izwe lethu lilulama kubhubhane olubi lwe gciwane lecorona, asingabazi neze ngomsebenzi omkhulu osasimele phambi kwethu.

src_text: kufuneka siphumeze ukubuyela kwimeko yesiqhelo koqoqosho olukhawulezayo futhi nolubandakanyayo.
tgt_text: kumele sizuze ukuvusele lwa komnotho okusheshayo futhi okubandakanya wo nke umuntu.

src_text: kufuneka senze ukuba abantu bethu abaninzi babuyele emisebenzini kwakhona kanga ngoko kunokwenzeka.
tgt_text: kumele senze ukuthi abantu bakithi abaningi baqalise ukusebenza futhi.

src_text: kwa khona kufuneka sizuze inkxa so esiphulukene nayo yobone lelo ngeenkonzo ezisisiseko kunye neziseko ezingundoqo ezibalulekileyo, ukujongana nemicelimngeni kwezentlalo nokuguqula iilokishi kunye noluntu lwasemaphandleni.
tgt_text: kumele futhi sizithole ukuthi simephi mayelana nokuhlinzekwa kwezinsiza eziyisisekelo nengqalasizinda ebucayi, ukubhekana nezinselele zenhlalo kanye nokuguqulwa kwamalokishi nemiphakathi yasemakhaya.

src_text: ukuqeshwa koluntu sisixhobo esinokukwenza konke oku kungentla: ukuvelisa imisebenzi kangangoko ngexesha elifutshane ngelixa iimarike zibuyela kwimeko yesiqhelo, kunye nokuvelisa ixabiso lentlalontle kwangaxeshanye.
tgt_text: ukuqashwa komphakathi kungakwenza konke lokhu okungenhla: ukusungula imisebenzi yesikhathi esifu shane ngesikhathi izimakethe zisalulama, kanye nokusu ngula ubugugu bomphakathi sikhathi sinye.

src_text: umzekelo uhlala ukha nkanywa kwinkqubo enkulu yemisebenzi karhulumente eyenziwa yimelika emva kokudakumba okukhulu kwamashishini kwiminyaka yowee1930.
tgt_text: isibonelo sihlale sishiwo ohlelweni olukhulu lo msebenzi womphakathi owenziwa imelika emva kwesehlakalo esinzima sokuwa komnotho igreat depression ngeminyaka ye1930.

src_text: oku yayingekuko nje ukuvuselela, kodwa yayikukukhuthaza ukuthatha inxaxheba kwezentlalo kunye nokuqukwa.
tgt_text: lokhu kwakungewona nje umzamo, kodwa kwagqugquzela ukubamba iqhaza komphakathi nokuzibandakanya.

src_text: mininzi imizekelo yeenkqubo zemisebenzi yoluntu yo kuqaliswa kwezinto ezintsha kwilizwe elisakhulayo, kuquka eindia, eethiopia nalapha emzantsi afrika.
tgt_text: ziningi izibonelo zezi nhlelo ezintsha zemisebenzi yomphakathi emhlabeni othuthukayo, kubandakanya iindia, iethopia kanye nalapha eningizimu afrika.

src_text: ezi nkqubo zenza utyalomali oluthe ngqo kuqoqosho lwa sekhaya, zifikelela kwiindawo ezihlwempuzekileyo kuqala, zixhasa amashishini ama ncinci asekuhlaleni zize zi dluliselwe kuqoqosho oluba nzi ukusuka apho.
tgt_text: lezi zinhlelo zitshala ngqo izimali eminothweni yase khaya, zifinyelela ezindawe ni ezihlwempu kuqala, ze seka amabhizinisi asekhaya amancane bese ziqhubeke njalo ukusuka lapho ngobubanzi bomnotho.

src_text: zikwakhuthaza ukuthatha inxaxheba kwezentlalo kunye nokuqukwa, kokubonelelwa koluntu ngeendlela zokutshintsha ubomi balo nje ngoko luqala iintlobo ezintsha zomsebenzi.
tgt_text: ziphinde zigqugquzele ukubamba iqhaza komphakathi nokuzibandakanya, ngokuhlinzeka imiphakathi ngezindlela zokushintsha izimpilo zayo ngokuthatha umsebenzi omusha.

src_text: ngokwenza njalo, luba negalelo kutshintsho kwinqanaba lasekuhlaleni kunye nololuntu ngokubanzi.
tgt_text: ngokwenza njalo, zifaka isandla ekwenzeni izinguquko ezi ngeni lasekhaya kanye na semphakathini ngobubanzi.

src_text: utyalomali loluntu oluthe ngqo kukuxhasa ingqesho kunye nokuvelisa amathuba ezoqoqosho avelisa ixabiso lentlalontle oluya kwenza ngaphezulu kunokujongana nengxaki yentswelangqesho.
tgt_text: ukutshala ngqo izimali emphakathini ukuze kwesekwe imisebenzi noku sungula amathuba omnotho azokhiqiza ubugugu bo mphakathi kwenza oku ngaphezu nje kokubhekana nesimo esinzima sokuswe lakala kwemisebenzi.

src_text: iyaphendula, kuba isebe nzisa izixhobo zikarhulu mente ukusabela kwiimfuno zoluntu, nokuba zezeendawo zoluntu eziqulathe umhlaba onengca neentyatyambo, ukhuseleko lokutya, amaziko ophuhliso lwabantwana abasakhulayo, okanye iindlela ezingcono nezifikelelekayo nangakumbi.
tgt_text: kuyaphenduleka, ngoba kusetshenziswa izinsiza zikahulumeni ukubhekana nezidingo zomphakathi, ku ngaba amathafa, ukuvikelwa kokudla, ezinye izikhungo zokuthuthukiswa koku khula kwabantwana, noma ukwenza ngcono imigwaqo futhi ifinyeleleke kalula.

src_text: inenkqubelaphambili, kuba inikezela ngokhuseleko lwezentlalo kunye nokhuseleko lwemivuzo kwabo bajongene nokuswela ngenxa yokuba bengakwazi ukufumana umsebenzi.
tgt_text: kuyinqubekelaphambili, ngoba kuhlinzeka ngokuvikelwa komphakathi nemalingeniso evikelekile kulabo ababhekene nenhlu pheko ngenxa yokungakwa zi ukuthola umsebenzi.

src_text: lutyalomali lwexesha elizayo, kuba luxhasa iajenda yokuvuselelwa ngokubanzi kwezoqoqosho ngokuthi kubuyiselwe ngokukhawuleza abantu bethu ukuba basebenze ekuphuculeni iziseko zethu ezingundoqo zesizwe nezikamasipala.
tgt_text: lokhu kungukubekelela ikusasa, ngenxa yokuthi kusekela uhlelo lokuvuse lelwa komnotho ngokuthola ngokuphuthuma okukhulu ukuthi abantu bethu basebenze ukwenza ngcono ingqalasizinda yethu kuzwelonke nakomasipala.

src_text: ngenxa yongenelelo kuvuselelo, sidala imisebenzi kwabo bayidingayo, ngelixa sishiya ifuthe eliya kuhlala lihleli ixesha elide kuluntu luphela.
tgt_text: ngokungenelela emizameni, sisungula imisebenzi kulabo abayidingayo, ngesikhathi sishiya umphumela oyohlezi ukhona njalo emi phakathini yonke.

src_text: njengeenkqubo zokuqesha zikarhulumente kwihlabathi jikelele, oku kuvuselelwa kwengqesho kuxhasa kwaye kufezekisa indima ebalulekileyo yecandelo labucala ekuveliseni imisebenzi.
tgt_text: njengezinye izinhlelo zomsebenzi womphakathi emhlabeni jikelele, lo mzamo wamathuba emisebenzi usekela futhi ugcwalisa iqhaza elibalulekile lomkhakha ozimele ekusunguleni imisebenzi.

src_text: kuyinto ejikelezayo, kuba njengoko ukubuyela kwimeko yesiqhelo kuqhubela pha mbili, inqanaba lokuqeshwa koluntu luza kuhla.
tgt_text: kuyaphambanake, ukuthi uma ukuvuselelwa komnotho kukhuphuka, izinga lemisebenzi emphakathini lizokwehla.

src_text: amava omsebenzi kunye nezakhono ezifunyenwe ngabaxhamli bokuvuselela ingqesho ngumongameli aya kuphucula amathuba abo okufumana ingqesho ese mgangathweni.
tgt_text: isipiliyoni somsebenzi namakhono azotholwa ngaba zuze kumzamo kamongame li wokusungula imisebenzi kuzovuselela amathemba okuqashwa ngokusemthe thweni.

src_text: amava afunyenweyo akwayindlela eya kwi misebenzi yezorhwebo.
tgt_text: isipiliyoni esitholiwe futhi siyindlela eholela ekuziqa leleni ibhizinisi lakho.

src_text: abathathinxaxheba baza kuphucula izakhono zabo kunye namandla abo okuqala amashishini abo, futhi banokusebenzisa umvuzo ozinzi leyo obonelelwa yingqesho karhulumente ukuhlumisa eminye imisebenzi engenisa imali.
tgt_text: aba bambe iqhaza bazothuthu kisa amakhono abo kanye nolwazi lwabo ukuze baqale awabo amabhizinisi, futhi bangasebenzisa imalingeniso ehlinzekwe ngemisebenzi yomphakathi ukuziqalela eminye imisebenzi engabe nzela imali.

src_text: bendisoloko ndiqinisekisa ukuba ingxaki yecovid19 ikwalithuba lokwakha ngcono kwakhona.
tgt_text: ngiqinisekisile ngoku ngaguquki ukuthi isimo esibi secovid19 siyintuba yethuba lokuphinde sakhe kangcono.

src_text: ngeli xesha lesiphithiphithi esikhulu, siya kube singazincedi ngokuthi senze izithembiso ezingafezekisekiyo eziphakamisa ulindeleko, kuze kwe nzeke ukuba singaphumeleli xa zingahlangatyezwanga.
tgt_text: kulesi sikhathi sesiphithiphithi, siyobe asizenzeli kahle uma senza izithembiso ezingeke zifezeke ezinyusa amathemba, bese siya phoxeka uma zingafezeki.

src_text: yiyo loo nto eminye yemisebenzi kunye namangenelelo enkxaso yokuphila exhaswa ngemali ngokupheleleyo, sinesicwangciso sokuphumeza esicacileyo.
tgt_text: yingakho omunye nomunye wemisebenzi nokungenelela kokusekela indlela yokuziphilisa kuxhaswe ngoku gcwele, nohlelo olucace bha lokuqalisa ukusebenza.

src_text: isicwangciso sengqesho asikho malunga nokuzibo phelela okungacacanga ka ngangexesha elithile kwixesha elizayo, kodwa kumalunga nemisebenzi eveliswayo apha nangoku.
tgt_text: umzamo wokusungula imisebenzi awusikho nje ukuzibophezela okufi phele kwesikhathi esithile esikhathini esizayo, kodwa umayelana nokusungulwa kwemisebenzi lapha futhi njengamanje.

src_text: isicwangciso sisiphumo sothethathethwano olubanzi namasebe esizwe, awama phondo kunye nawezixeko ezimbaxa ukuba kuyilwe ngokukhawuleza iinkqubo zemisebenzi ezinokuthi zi khutshwe okanye zandiswe kwixesha leenyanga ezinta ndathu.
tgt_text: umzamo wokusungula imisebenzi ungumphumela wokubonisana okujulile neminyango kazwelonke, yezi fundazwe kanye nomasipala ukuze kwakhiwe ngokushe sha izinhlelo zomsebenzi ezizoqala ukusebenza noma zisatshalaliswe ezinyangeni eziyisithupha.

src_text: amasebe afezekisayo kunye namanye amahlakani ahlolisiswe ngokungqongqo ukuba anawo kusini na umthamo wokufezekisa.
tgt_text: iminyango ezoqalisa imisebenzi kanye nabanye ababambiqhaza bahlolisiswa ukuthi bazokwazi yini ukuqalisa le misebenzi.

src_text: kuzo zonke iinkqubo eziwela phantsi kokuvuse lela, anezithuba eziza kubhe ngezwa ngokubanzi futhi ukufunyanwa kwabasebenzi kuza kwenziwa ngobulungisa, kuvuleke kwaye kubonakale.
tgt_text: kuzozonke izinhlelo ezingaphansi komzamo wokusungula imisebenzi, amathuba emisebenzi azo khangiswa futhi nokuqa shwa kuzoba neqiniso, kuvu leleke futhi kube sobala.

src_text: iinjongo esizibeke ngokwe thu ziyinyani, zinokulingani swa kwaye zinokufikeleleka, futhi sifunde namava adlulileyo kunye nezenzo ezilungi leyo zamanye amazwe.
tgt_text: imigomo esizibekele yona eyangempela, iyisilinganiso esilungile futhi iyafezeka, futhi inezifundo kwesidlule kukhona kanye nemisebenzi emihle yomhlaba.

src_text: abantu bethu bakulungele kwaye bazimisele ukusebenza.
tgt_text: abantu bakithi bame ngomumo futhi bazimisele ngo kusebenza.

src_text: obu buchule bukhulu kufuneka busetyenziswe, kwaye izakhono zomdibaniselwano wethu kunye nobuchule ziziswe ekwakheni ilizwe lethu emva kwentsholongwane icorona.
tgt_text: la mandla ama khulu kumele aboshelwe, namakhono nolwazi lwethu oluhlangene sikusebenzise ukwakha kabusha izwe lethu emva kwegciwane lecorona.

src_text: isicwangciso sikamongameli sokudala imisebenzi sibonelela ngekhefu kwiintsapho eziye zanyamezela ubusika obude nobunzima zinemivuzo enciphe kakhulu, kunye nabantu abachithe iminyaka emininzi bengena misebenzi.
tgt_text: umzamo kamongameli wokusungula imisebenzi wethula umthwalo emindenini ebibekezelele ubusika obude obunzima ngemali ngeniso eyehliswe kakhulu, nalabo bantu asebephile iminyaka eminingi bengasebenzi.

src_text: umsebenzi wokwenyani, nonesidima lilungelo lomntu wonke.
tgt_text: ngempela, umsebenzi ohloniphekile uyilungelo lawowonke umuntu.

src_text: yinto efunekayo eku khuleni koqoqosho nakuzinzo lwezentlalo.
